translation.en: -[male announcer] Are you ready? -[cheering]
translation.zh: 你们准备好了吗？

translation.en: I said, "Are you ready, Woodbright High?"
translation.zh: 我问你们呢“准备好了吗 亮木高中？”

translation.en: Give it up for the reigning champions of the Work It Dance Competition,
translation.zh: 掌声献给飙舞追梦大赛的卫冕冠军

translation.en: your very own Thunderbirds!
translation.zh: 你们的雷鸟！

translation.en: [girl] Albert Einstein once said that dancers are the athletes of God.
translation.zh: 阿尔伯特爱因斯坦曾说舞者是上帝的运动员

translation.en: Kim Kardashian once said, "Lighting is everything."
translation.zh: 金卡戴珊曾说 “灯光就是一切”

translation.en: And as head of the AV club, I had to agree.
translation.zh: 作为影音俱乐部的负责人我不得不同意

translation.en: Sometimes I wonder,
translation.zh: 有时候 我会想如果爱因斯坦现在还活着

translation.en: if Einstein were alive today, would he have even gotten into college?
translation.zh: 有时候 我会想如果爱因斯坦现在还活着 他能进大学吗？

translation.en: I mean, sure, he was good at math and science,
translation.zh: 我是说 没错 他擅长数学和科学

translation.en: but did he have extracurriculars?
translation.zh: 但他有课外活动吗？

translation.en: These days, great colleges want a little bit of everything,
translation.zh: 如今 优秀的大学都要求面面俱到

translation.en: and I thought I had it all on lock.
translation.zh: 我觉得我已经胜券在握了

translation.en: I started my mornings with a TED Talk,
translation.zh: 每天醒来第一件事 就是看TED演讲

translation.en: because who doesn't love a good life hack?
translation.zh: 谁不喜欢提高生活质量的好建议呢？

translation.en: [Female TED Talker] And that is why cold showers -are empirically more effec-- -[gasps]
translation.zh: 所以冷水淋浴更加有效…

translation.en: [girl] I ride to school every day with my best friend, Jas.
translation.zh: 然后我会坐闺蜜杰斯的车去上学

translation.en: Come on, hurry up! I have a bio test to fail.
translation.zh: 快点啦！我有生物考试 等着挂科呢

translation.en: [girl] We've been inseparable since kindergarten, when she gave this kid a wedgie
translation.zh: 从幼儿园起 我们就形影不离她用鞋底抽了一个同学

translation.en: for making fun of my Bill Nye the Science Guy lunch box.
translation.zh: 因为那人嘲笑我的《比尔教科学》饭盒

translation.en: Jas isn't too worried about grades,
translation.zh: 杰斯不太担心成绩

translation.en: because she's gonna be a professional dancer.
translation.zh: 因为她要成为一名专业舞者

translation.en: [girl] While Jas was twerking up a storm,
translation.zh: 杰斯跳舞跳得风生水起

translation.en: I was building an impressive college résumé
translation.zh: 而我在打造漂亮的大学申请简历

translation.en: with a well-calculated assortment of AP classes,
translation.zh: 参加精心设计的各类预科课程加入学生会

translation.en: student government, and I even volunteered at a local nursing home.
translation.zh: 参加精心设计的各类预科课程加入学生会 甚至在当地的养老院做志愿者

translation.en: Anything to make my application fully rejection-proof.
translation.zh: 只为让我的申请无法拒绝

translation.en: Okay, so I didn't have a boyfriend or a car or a bustling social calendar,
translation.zh: 好吧 所以我没有男友 没有车也没有繁忙的社交安排

translation.en: but it was all gonna pay off when I got into my dream school, Duke University.
translation.zh: 但这一切都会有回报的 我要进入我的梦想学校 杜克大学

translation.en: I thought I had it all figured out,
translation.zh: 我以为我都安排妥当了

translation.en: until one day, everything kind of spun out of control.
translation.zh: 直到有一天 一切都失去控制了

translation.en: That was a great show today, guys.
translation.zh: 今天的表演很精彩 伙计们

translation.en: I thought it was one of our better ones, actually.
translation.zh: 说实话 我觉得这次算发挥很棒的

translation.en: There was, like, a couple kinks in there, but,
translation.zh: 有几个小问题 但你们懂的

translation.en: you know, we'll just work on all that moving forward.
translation.zh: 我们会继续努力 多向前看

translation.en: Overall, I-I'm extremely happy.
translation.zh: 总之 我特别开心

translation.en: Brit's hair was singed.
translation.zh: 布瑞特的头发被烧焦了

translation.en: She's probably gonna have to get bangs now,
translation.zh: 她现在可能要留刘海了

translation.en: and she does not have the face for that.
translation.zh: 她的脸型不适合刘海的

translation.en: -Look, Isaiah, I-- -[dancers gasp]
translation.zh: 听着 以赛亚 我…

translation.en: I mean, Juilliard.
translation.zh: 我是说 茱莉亚

translation.en: I can assure you it was an accident.
translation.zh: 我可以跟你保证 那只是一次意外

translation.en: You know, the Work It Competition is in five months,
translation.zh: 距离飙舞追梦大赛还有五个月

translation.en: and it is my responsibility to lead our team to a fourth consecutive victory.
translation.zh: 我有责任带领我们的舞团取得四连胜

translation.en: Do you understand?
translation.zh: 你明白吗？

translation.en: You know, when people hear the name "Woodbright High," they think this.
translation.zh: 要知道 人们听到“亮木高中”就会想到这张脸

translation.en: -The Thunderbirds. -It won't happen again.
translation.zh: -雷鸟舞团-下不为例

translation.en: Of course it won't, 'cause you're off the light board.
translation.zh: 当然 因为你不再负责灯光了

translation.en: Brit, can you call Chris Chu?
translation.zh: -布瑞特 你能打给克里斯楚吗？-克里斯楚？

translation.en: Chris Chu? You can't replace me with Chris Chu.
translation.zh: -布瑞特 你能打给克里斯楚吗？-克里斯楚？ 你不能用克里斯楚换掉我呀他会的东西 都是我教的

translation.en: I taught Chris Chu everything he knows.
translation.zh: 你不能用克里斯楚换掉我呀他会的东西 都是我教的

translation.en: -It's ringing. -Juilliard, please, you can't do this.
translation.zh: -打通了-茱莉亚 拜托 你不能这样做

translation.en: Look, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 听我说 我很抱歉

translation.en: Honestly, Quinn, I don't accept your apology,
translation.zh: 说实话 奎因 我不接受你的道歉

translation.en: I'd like you to pack your things and clear out your locker.
translation.zh: 我希望你赶紧打包 把更衣柜腾空了

translation.en: You can't expel me. We're in the same French class.
translation.zh: 你不能开除我 我们在同一个法语班

translation.en: Baby, you're canceled.
translation.zh: 宝贝 你被除名了

translation.en: -What? -You're deleted. You're unsubscribed.
translation.zh: -什么？-你被删除了 你被退订了

translation.en: Control, alt, delete.
translation.zh: 强制关闭了

translation.en: I don't understand.
translation.zh: 我不明白

translation.en: You are banished from this room. Do you understand that?
translation.zh: 不允许你再进入这间屋子了 这次明白了吧？

translation.en: [Quinn] You're probably wondering, why Duke? Why not Yale or Penn
translation.zh: 你们可能会想 为什么选杜克大学？ 怎么不选耶鲁 或者宾大

translation.en: or Harvard?
translation.zh: 或者哈佛？

translation.en: Although, fun fact, Duke is the Harvard of the South.
translation.zh: 不过有趣的是 杜克就是南方的哈佛

translation.en: [mom] Quinn, wake up! Today's the day! Duke interview!
translation.zh: 奎因 醒醒！今天是杜克大学面试的日子！

translation.en: [Quinn] My dad went there,
translation.zh: 我爸是那里的学生

translation.en: so I grew up going to football games and alumni events,
translation.zh: 我从小就参加橄榄球比赛和校友活动

translation.en: and… I don't know, it just feels like home.
translation.zh: 所以…我也说不好 那里感觉像家一样

translation.en: You know, if home had less than a six percent acceptance rate.
translation.zh: 你懂的 如果家的录取率不到6%的话

translation.en: Strengths?
translation.zh: 优势？

translation.en: Intensity, intelligence, drive, compassion.
translation.zh: 认真 睿智 积极 善良

translation.en: Weaknesses?
translation.zh: 缺点？

translation.en: Single-mindedness… which, if you think about it, can be a strength.
translation.zh: 死心眼… 如果细想一下 也可以算作优势

translation.en: This is just the first step. Pretty soon, you'll be premed,
translation.zh: 这只是第一步 你很快就会成为医学预科生然后成为奎因医生

translation.en: and then you'll be Dr. Quinn.
translation.zh: 你很快就会成为医学预科生然后成为奎因医生

translation.en: Okay, all right. I'm gonna focus now.
translation.zh: 好吧 我要先专心面试了

translation.en: -[mom] Okay. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好的-好的

translation.en: [mom] I love ya.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: Mom. Mom! What are you doing?
translation.zh: 妈妈 你在做什么？

translation.en: I'm putting you in the zone with my pump-up jam.
translation.zh: 我要用我的鼓劲音乐 帮你进入状态

translation.en: This is the jam I put on when I need to get pumped up.
translation.zh: 当我需要加油鼓劲时 我就放这首歌

translation.en: Did you bring this
translation.zh: 你特意准备了这首歌吗？

translation.en: -just for this moment? -Bet your ass I did.
translation.zh: 你特意准备了这首歌吗？ 那是肯定的

translation.en: -That's nice. That's cool. -[mom] Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 太好了 太棒了

translation.en: Fun. All right. All right, we're good.
translation.zh: 很好玩 好了 可以了

translation.en: Mom, people-- people can see us.
translation.zh: 妈妈 大家能看到我们的

translation.en: -People are watching. -'Cause they're jealous.
translation.zh: -别人在看着呢-那是他们嫉妒

translation.en: Now they're looking at me -because they're looking at you. -♪ Stand up and make it happen ♪
translation.zh: 他们在看你 也在顺道看我呢

translation.en: -Quinn. -Mom.
translation.zh: -奎因-妈妈

translation.en: -[mom] 'Kay, I love you. Love you!
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: -[door shuts] -[mom] Even though you don't say it, I know you love me.
translation.zh: 即使你不说 我也知道你爱我

translation.en: -[music fades] -I'm first in my class.
translation.zh: 我是全班第一名

translation.en: I am a National Merit scholar, 4.0 GPA.
translation.zh: 得过优秀学生奖学金 平均成绩4.0

translation.en: I volunteer three afternoons a week at a local nursing home near my house.
translation.zh: 每周有三天的下午去我家附近的养老院做志愿者

translation.en: I'm also student government treasurer.
translation.zh: 我还是学生会财务主管

translation.en: -Did I mention head of the AV club? -I'm gonna stop you right there.
translation.zh: 我说我是影音娱乐部负责人了吗？ 我先打断你一下

translation.en: Student government. AV club. Volunteering.
translation.zh: 学生会 影音俱乐部 志愿者

translation.en: -All applicants, nearly identical. -But do they also play the cello?
translation.zh: 所有申请者几乎一模一样 但他们也会拉大提琴吗？

translation.en: Yes, everybody plays the cello. And nobody likes playing the cello.
translation.zh: 是的 每个人都会但没有人喜欢拉大提琴

translation.en: I love the cello.
translation.zh: 我很爱大提琴

translation.en: Can you do for the cello what Lizzo does for the flute?
translation.zh: 你能像莉佐用长笛那样拉大提琴吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不能

translation.en: What are you passionate about? What gets you out of bed in the morning?
translation.zh: 你热爱什么？是什么让你有动力起床的？

translation.en: TED Talks.
translation.zh: TED演讲

translation.en: Oh, girl, that's sad. Squirrel friend, are you for real?
translation.zh: 姑娘 那也太悲哀了 你是说真的吗？

translation.en: Have you read a newspaper lately or even looked at the news?
translation.zh: 你最近读过报纸吗 看过新闻吗？

translation.en: The world is burning.
translation.zh: 世界在燃烧

translation.en: I am looking for applicants that are change-makers, risk-takers.
translation.zh: 我想要那些能够改变 敢于冒险的申请者

translation.en: You know what I mean?
translation.zh: 你知道我的意思吗？

translation.en: Not applicants that just, like, can fill the box.
translation.zh: 不是那种把盒子装满的申请者

translation.en: I want an applicant to blow the box up.
translation.zh: 而是能把盒子炸掉的申请者

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Look, I am just trying to figure out who you are, who you really are.
translation.zh: 听着 我只想弄清楚你是谁你到底是什么样

translation.en: What's your passion? What are you passionate about?
translation.zh: 你有什么爱好？你热爱什么？

translation.en: Passion.
translation.zh: 你的…激情

translation.en: Duke.
translation.zh: -杜克-太悲哀了

translation.en: That's sad, unless it's a guy named Duke that's really hot, okay?
translation.zh: -杜克-太悲哀了 除非是一个叫做杜克的帅哥 好吗？

translation.en: Because it's just a school.
translation.zh: 因为这里只是一间学校

translation.en: It's just walls.
translation.zh: 只是几面墙壁

translation.en: It's not passion.
translation.zh: 不是激情所在

translation.en: You know what? This was very fun. Thank you so much for coming in.
translation.zh: 好吧 跟你聊得很开心 感谢你来面试

translation.en: No, wait, please, Ms. Ramirez…
translation.zh: 不要 等等 拉米雷兹老师…

translation.en: this is all I've ever wanted.
translation.zh: 这里就是我的心之所向

translation.en: You see, my dad…
translation.zh: 我父亲…

translation.en: he went here, and he died when I was 12.
translation.zh: 他就是校友 在我12岁时 他过世了

translation.en: And my mom's had to work two jobs just to support us.
translation.zh: 我母亲要做两份工作养家糊口

translation.en: What school do you go to?
translation.zh: 你在哪里上学来着？

translation.en: -Woodbright High. -Woodbright High?
translation.zh: 亮木高中 亮木高中？

translation.en: Oh, isn't that the school with the dance team?
translation.zh: 你们学校是不是有一个舞团

translation.en: With the birds or something that was on Ellen?
translation.zh: 叫什么鸟来着 还上过艾伦的节目？

translation.en: Yeah, they…
translation.zh: 是啊 他们…

translation.en: Yes… we were, after winning the Work It Dance Competition last year.
translation.zh: 是啊 得到飙舞追梦大赛冠军后我们上过她的节目

translation.en: Well, this is just fascinating.
translation.zh: 这也太厉害了

translation.en: I had no idea you were part of the dance team.
translation.zh: 我没想到你是舞团的成员

translation.en: I'm a-- I'm a contributor.
translation.zh: 我也有做贡献的

translation.en: That's excellent. What's your style?
translation.zh: 太棒了 你跳什么舞风？

translation.en: -I'm sorry? -Your style of dance, honey.
translation.zh: -什么意思？-你的舞蹈风格 宝贝

translation.en: Are you a breaker?
translation.zh: 你跳霹雳舞？

translation.en: Are you a wall climber?
translation.zh: 攀岩舞？

translation.en: Are you into Zumba? You just put on some neon shorts and just do a grapevine?
translation.zh: 还是尊巴舞？穿上闪亮短裤 然后跳葡萄藤舞步？

translation.en: What kind of dance do you do?
translation.zh: 你跳什么舞？

translation.en: -I'm an i-illuminator. -Sorry?
translation.zh: -我是照明者-什么？

translation.en: An illuminator.
translation.zh: 照明者

translation.en: Ooh, illuminator. I've never heard of that before.
translation.zh: 照明者 我以前从没听说过

translation.en: That must be really something. What do you do?
translation.zh: 肯定确有其职吧 你具体做什么？

translation.en: I just… I-I keep it lit, you know.
translation.zh: 我给舞台带来光明 你懂的

translation.en: I definitely misread you, Ms. Ackerman.
translation.zh: 我真是误解你了 艾克曼小姐

translation.en: I mean, dance team?
translation.zh: 我是说 舞团吗？

translation.en: That takes emotion, power, grit. Here I thought you were all just, like,
translation.zh: 那需要情感、力量和勇气 我以为你只有简历和成绩单呢

translation.en: résumés and transcripts.
translation.zh: 我以为你只有简历和成绩单呢

translation.en: You're the most exciting applicant I've seen this week.
translation.zh: 你是这周最让人激动的申请者了

translation.en: I'm so happy. I will see you at the Work It Dance Competition,
translation.zh: 我好开心 我们在飙舞追梦大赛见吧

translation.en: -okay? -You're going?
translation.zh: -好吗？-你要去吗？

translation.en: Hell yes! I wouldn't miss it.
translation.zh: 当然了！不容错过呀

translation.en: So, what did you talk about?
translation.zh: 你们都聊什么了？

translation.en: You were in there for such a long time, Quinn.
translation.zh: 你在里面呆了很久呢 奎因

translation.en: -Just school and stuff. -School and stuff? [gibbers]
translation.zh: 聊聊学校什么的 学校什么的？拜托！仔细说说呗

translation.en: Come on! Give me more than that. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 学校什么的？拜托！仔细说说呗

translation.en: Oh, did you tell her that you wanted to go premed?
translation.zh: 你告诉她 你想读医学预科了吗？

translation.en: -Mm-hm. -Yeah? Was she impressed?
translation.zh: 是吗？她震惊了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah? 'Course she was.
translation.zh: -是啊-是吧？当然会了

translation.en: I told you she'd be impressed.
translation.zh: 我就说她会留下好印象的

translation.en: Okay, what else? What else did you talk about?
translation.zh: 好吧 你们还聊什么了？

translation.en: She... You know, I vaguely remember her saying, uh,
translation.zh: 她…我依稀记得她说

translation.en: that I would make a great addition to the Duke family
translation.zh: 我会成为杜克大家庭的一员

translation.en: and to keep up the good work.
translation.zh: 继续创造辉煌

translation.en: Oh my God. You're a shoo-in. You're a shoo-in. I knew it!
translation.zh: 天啊 你稳操胜券了 我就知道！我太为你骄傲了

translation.en: -I am so proud of you. -Oh, great. [grunting]
translation.zh: 天啊 你稳操胜券了 我就知道！我太为你骄傲了 太好了

translation.en: [Quinn] "Dear Ms. Ramirez,
translation.zh: “亲爱的拉米雷兹老师

translation.en: Winston Churchill once said,
translation.zh: 温斯顿丘吉尔曾经说过

translation.en: 'The price for greatness is responsibility.'
translation.zh: ‘伟大的代价是责任’

translation.en: So, I'm taking responsibility for my actions.
translation.zh: 所以我要对自己的行为负责

translation.en: I wasn't entirely honest with you when I said I was a Thunderbird.
translation.zh: 我说自己是雷鸟舞团成员时没有对您完全诚实

translation.en: Hey. Hey, can I talk to you for a minute?
translation.zh: 嘿 我能跟你谈一下吗？

translation.en: Make it quick, honey.
translation.zh: 有话快说 宝贝

translation.en: Okay. So, I've been thinking about the routine for Work It, and…
translation.zh: 好吧 我在考虑飙舞追梦大赛的动作

translation.en: Well, I was hoping I could be featured.
translation.zh: 我希望我能领舞

translation.en: There's gonna be a lot of recruiters there--
translation.zh: 到时会有很多招生老师来看比赛

translation.en: Everybody knows that the recruiters are coming
translation.zh: 人人都知道 那些招生老师

translation.en: to see me lead the Thunderbirds to victory.
translation.zh: 都是来看我带领雷鸟夺冠的

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Well, uh…
translation.zh: 说起来…

translation.en: I actually think I'm just as good as you are.
translation.zh: 我觉得我跟你一样优秀

translation.en: -Oh, really? -Mmm… maybe better.
translation.zh: 真的吗？ 也许比你更强

translation.en: [Jas] Let's go then.
translation.zh: 咱们走吧

translation.en: [Jas] Come on! Come on!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: Sashay away, Jasmine. You won't ever be on my level.
translation.zh: 走远点吧 杰斯明 你达不到我的水平的

translation.en: Never.
translation.zh: 别做梦了

translation.en: [Quinn] So, I had to join the dance team. Me.
translation.zh: 所以我必须加入舞团

translation.en: A girl who couldn't find her own heartbeat,
translation.zh: 我连自己的心跳节拍都找不准

translation.en: let alone a four-count.
translation.zh: 更别说音乐节拍了

translation.en: When I was five, my mom enrolled me in a ballet class,
translation.zh: 五岁时 妈妈给我报了一个芭蕾舞班

translation.en: and I single-handedly ruined our recital.
translation.zh: 结果我们的演出 被我一手毁掉了

translation.en: But if there's one thing I am good at, it's studying.
translation.zh: 但要说我擅长什么 那就是学习

translation.en: I just needed the right teacher.
translation.zh: 我只需要一个合适的老师

translation.en: -Hey! -Whoa! Jeez, you scared me. What?
translation.zh: -嘿！-天啊 吓到我了 怎么了？

translation.en: I need to ask you something, and it's gonna sound absurd at first,
translation.zh: 我要问你一件事可能初听起来有点荒谬

translation.en: -but I just need you to bear with me. -No no. Mm-mm.
translation.zh: -但请耐心听我说完-不要

translation.en: I am not helping with your science project again,
translation.zh: 我不会再帮你做科学项目了

translation.en: -not after you electrocuted me last year. -It was a very low voltage.
translation.zh: -你去年差点把我电死-那电压很低的！

translation.en: Dude, I couldn't feel my pinkie for a week!
translation.zh: 拜托 我的小手指一周都没知觉！

translation.en: Okay, I need you to help me get on the Thunderbirds.
translation.zh: 好吧 我需要你帮我加入雷鸟舞团

translation.en: You mean, like, back on the light board?
translation.zh: 你是说 重新负责灯光吗？

translation.en: No, I mean, like, as a dancer.
translation.zh: 不 我是说 作为舞者加入

translation.en: [laughs] That's a good one.
translation.zh: 这笑话不错

translation.en: Why aren't you laughing? Dude, you don't dance.
translation.zh: 你怎么不笑？你不会跳舞呀

translation.en: -[chuckles] I don't dance yet. -You don't dance at all.
translation.zh: -目前不会而已-你根本不跳舞的！

translation.en: Remember we had a conversation about flossing
translation.zh: 还记得我们讨论牙线舞吗？

translation.en: and you thought I was talking about oral hygiene?
translation.zh: 你还以为我在说口腔卫生呢

translation.en: -We weren't talking about oral hygiene? -No, we weren't!
translation.zh: -难道不是在说口腔卫生吗？-不是！

translation.en: Look... I really screwed up my Duke interview,
translation.zh: 听着 我把杜克大学的面试搞砸了

translation.en: and I may have led the admissions lady to believe that I'm a Thunderbird.
translation.zh: 我让招生老师误以为我是雷鸟的成员了

translation.en: [laughs] What? Why would-- Why would you do that?
translation.zh: 什么？你为什么那么做？

translation.en: I-I don't know! She-she kept saying that she wanted to shake things up,
translation.zh: 我也不知道！她总是说 想看到大胆变革的人

translation.en: and it turns out that I'm a boring robot with no personal context,
translation.zh: 结果发现我是一个无聊的机器人没有个人情感

translation.en: and cellos are basic.
translation.zh: 而且人人都会大提琴

translation.en: -And Duke doesn't want boring people. -Well, screw them, all right? Don't go.
translation.zh: 杜克大学不想要无聊的人 那就拉倒呗 好吗？别去那里了

translation.en: Jas, how are your grades?
translation.zh: 杰斯 你的成绩如何？

translation.en: Terrible. You know this.
translation.zh: 很烂 你知道的

translation.en: Yes. So, what if New York Dance Academy wouldn't take you unless you had a 4.0?
translation.zh: 好的 如果你的成绩不到4.0纽约舞蹈学院就不录取你呢？

translation.en: Probably cry a little bit, and then I'd crack them damn books.
translation.zh: 也许哭几场 然后开始好好啃书

translation.en: Yeah, exactly, and I would help you.
translation.zh: 是啊 没错 而我会帮你

translation.en: But guess what? I have the exact opposite problem.
translation.zh: 但你猜怎么着？我有完全相反的问题

translation.en: I have a 4.0 GPA, and I need you to teach me how to dance.
translation.zh: 我的成绩是4.0 但我需要你教我跳舞

translation.en: Quinn, auditions are in two weeks, and more importantly, Juilliard hates you.
translation.zh: 奎因 距离招募海选还有两周更重要的是 茱莉亚讨厌你

translation.en: Look, if I'm undeniable, he has no choice but to take me.
translation.zh: 如果我足够优秀 他就只能让我加入杰斯 帮帮我吧

translation.en: Jas, please help me. I know you can do this.
translation.zh: 如果我足够优秀 他就只能让我加入杰斯 帮帮我吧 我知道你可以的

translation.en: You should've seen my mom's face after the interview.
translation.zh: 你应该看看面试以后 我妈妈的表情

translation.en: -How did she look at you? -It was sorta like…
translation.zh: 她是怎么看你的？ 差不多像这样…

translation.en: I hate that. Stop that right now. That is terrifying.
translation.zh: 太讨厌了 别再学了 太吓人了

translation.en: -Where are your eyeballs going? Stop. -Not till you say yes.
translation.zh: -你的眼球去哪了？别学了-那你先答应我

translation.en: Quinn, stop! Stop! Stop! Okay, fine!
translation.zh: 奎因 快停吧！好吧 可以！

translation.en: -Fine, yes. -Yes?
translation.zh: -好吧 可以-可以吗？

translation.en: Sorry, takes a second to get out of it. Okay.
translation.zh: 抱歉 让我缓缓 好了

translation.en: Where were you? Were you in the Upside Down?
translation.zh: 你去哪里了？ 《怪奇物语》的颠倒王国吗？

translation.en: God, I'm good.
translation.zh: 天啊 我好厉害

translation.en: -Yes! -Yeah!
-[music ends] -[phone chimes, buzzes]
translation.zh: （舞团 招募海选！）

translation.en: How many of you woke up this morning thinking,
translation.zh: 你们当中有多少人 早上醒来会想

translation.en: "Today is the day that I become a Bird"?
translation.zh: “今天我就要变成一只雷鸟了”？

translation.en: That was a question. Please raise your hands.
translation.zh: 我在提问 请举手回答

translation.en: Well, I got some hard news for you.
translation.zh: 我有坏消息要告诉你们

translation.en: We only have room in the crew for one of you.
translation.zh: 我们的舞团 只能再招募一个人

translation.en: The rest of you are going home.
translation.zh: 其他人只能回家去了

translation.en: Whoa. Ew, what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 哇哦 你在这里做什么？

translation.en: I banished you.
translation.zh: 我把你驱逐了

translation.en: Trinity, can you sage the space?
translation.zh: 崔尼蒂 你能来焚香辟秽吗？

translation.en: [whispers] Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是奎因

translation.en: [normal voice] It's-- It's Quinn… Ackerman.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是奎因 艾克曼

translation.en: Yes?
translation.zh: 是哦

translation.en: You-- [coughs] You banished me from the lighting booth,
translation.zh: 你把我从灯光室赶出去了

translation.en: but I'm-I'm here to audition.
translation.zh: 但我是来参加海选的

translation.en: To dance? You?
translation.zh: 来跳舞吗？你吗？

translation.en: [giggles] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Well, Quinn Ackerman…
translation.zh: 好吧 奎因艾克曼…

translation.en: you're up first, honey.
translation.zh: 你第一个来 宝贝

translation.en: Five, six, seven, eight.
translation.zh: 五 六 七 八

translation.en: Should I sage the space again?
translation.zh: 我要再焚一次香吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Okay, I know I suck.
translation.zh: 好吧 我知道我很烂

translation.en: But-- But I tried.
translation.zh: 但我努力了

translation.en: I couldn't dance at all before, and that-- that wasn't my best--
translation.zh: 我以前完全不会跳舞我刚没发挥最佳水平…

translation.en: She can't dance at all now.
translation.zh: 她现在也完全不会跳舞呀

translation.en: Please! You don't understand. I really need this.
translation.zh: 求你了 你不明白 我很需要加入

translation.en: -Jas-- -[Juilliard] Don't look at her.
translation.zh: -杰斯…-不要看她

translation.en: -It's not her team. It's my team. -It wasn't that bad.
translation.zh: -这是我的舞团 不是她的-也没那么糟吧

translation.en: [scoffs] Come on. You saw what I saw.
translation.zh: 拜托 我们都看见了

translation.en: She's got talent. She just needs some nurturing.
translation.zh: 她很有天赋的 只是需要好好培养

translation.en: Absolutely not.
translation.zh: 根本没有

translation.en: Look, she really does need this.
translation.zh: 她真的很需要

translation.en: Well then, she can start her own damn team for all I care.
translation.zh: 那她就自己组建舞团去呗

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Fine.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: I will start my own damn team then.
translation.zh: 那我就自己建一个舞团

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, best of luck.
translation.zh: 祝你好运了

translation.en: Everyone, where were we?
translation.zh: 各位 我们刚进行到哪了？

translation.en: And my team will be all about building people up.
translation.zh: 我的舞团将致力于培养人才

translation.en: Oh. This is still happening?
translation.zh: 你还在讲话呐？

translation.en: And you know what?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: Jas is gonna be my captain.
translation.zh: 杰斯会当我的队长

translation.en: There it is.
translation.zh: 该来的还是来了

translation.en: Say what?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: -[Quinn] Jas? -[Jas] No.
translation.zh: 杰斯？

translation.en: -Jas! -I'm not gonna--
translation.zh: 杰斯？走啦！

translation.en: Quinn, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 奎因 你在做什么？

translation.en: How much fun did we have dancing together these past two weeks?
translation.zh: 过去两周 我们一起跳舞 你开心吗？

translation.en: You don't want to dance for him.
translation.zh: 你不想陪他跳舞的

translation.en: Okay, now you're starting to piss me off. She isn't going with you.
translation.zh: 好吧 你们已经开始惹到我了 她不会跟你走的 她属于这里

translation.en: She's staying here.
translation.zh: 她不会跟你走的 她属于这里

translation.en: What side of history do you want to be on?
translation.zh: 你想站在历史的哪一边？

translation.en: We have no dancers.
translation.zh: 我们都没有舞者

translation.en: We will find dancers.
translation.zh: 我们会找到舞者的

translation.en: I promise you we can do this.
translation.zh: 我跟你保证 我们可以的

translation.en: There's never been another dance team at this school.
translation.zh: 这所学校从没有过其他舞团

translation.en: We can't lose Jas.
translation.zh: 我们不能失去杰斯

translation.en: She's fire.
translation.zh: 她很优秀

translation.en: No, she's not. She's completely overrated.
translation.zh: 才不是呢 她是被高估了

translation.en: Jas doesn't know one thing about fire.
translation.zh: 杰斯跟优秀一点都不沾边

translation.en: Quinn, you better be serious about this.
translation.zh: 奎因 你最好是认真的

translation.en: [whispers] My God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: That was the coolest thing I've ever done.
translation.zh: 那是我做过的最酷的事

translation.en: Oh my God. I can't believe that just happened.
translation.zh: 我的天啊 不敢相信刚才发生的事

translation.en: Honestly, neither can I.
translation.zh: 说实话 我也不敢相信

translation.en: No, no, no, no. I'm going back in there.
translation.zh: 不 我要回去

translation.en: No, you can't. You lost his trust. You can't go back now.
translation.zh: 不行 你失去他的信任了 不能回去了

translation.en: Dude, this may be the dumbest thing I've ever done.
translation.zh: 这可能是我做过的最愚蠢的事了

translation.en: No, what about the sexting incident with that guy Eugene?
translation.zh: 不 那跟那个叫尤金的家伙聊骚短信事件呢？

translation.en: Okay, the second dumbest thing I've ever done.
translation.zh: 好吧 那就是第二蠢的事

translation.en: -Why do I feel so nauseous? -Hey, calm down! It's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: -我为什么觉得恶心呢？-冷静下来！一切都会好起来的

translation.en: No, Quinn, I don't think you understand.
translation.zh: 不 奎因 我觉得你没明白

translation.en: A recruiter from the New York Dance Academy
translation.zh: 纽约舞蹈学院的招生老师

translation.en: is going to be at Work It,
translation.zh: 会来观看比赛的

translation.en: which means I need to be there on that stage, killing it.
translation.zh: 这意味着 我要登台飙舞 出色发挥

translation.en: You will be. I promise.
translation.zh: 你会的 我跟你保证

translation.en: Okay, can I get that in writing, please?
translation.zh: 好吧 你能做书面保证吗？

translation.en: Listen, you just need to sit back,
translation.zh: 听着 你只需要坐好 放轻松

translation.en: relax, and let me do what I do best.
translation.zh: 听着 你只需要坐好 放轻松 让我来做我最擅长的吧

translation.en: -Which is what? Stress me out? -No.
translation.zh: -你擅长什么 让我紧张吗？-不是

translation.en: Research and organization.
translation.zh: 研究和组织

translation.en: Okay, yeah, both of those words stress me out.
translation.zh: 好吧 这俩词都让我好紧张

translation.en: I've gathered up the ingredients we need to make an award-winning dance team.
translation.zh: 我已经收集到组成一支冠军舞团的要素了

translation.en: We need an incredible DJ for music,
translation.zh: 我们需要一个很棒的音乐DJ

translation.en: we need a flipper, someone with really great power moves,
translation.zh: 需要空翻舞者能做出高难度动作的人

translation.en: and most importantly, we need an amazing choreographer.
translation.zh: 最重要的是我们需要一位出色的编舞

translation.en: So, I've been looking at the previous competition winners,
translation.zh: 我一直在看之前的比赛冠军

translation.en: and it's this guy, Jake Taylor.
translation.zh: 发现了这个人 杰克泰勒

translation.en: He captained the winning team three years in a row.
translation.zh: 他连续三年担任获胜舞团的队长

translation.en: Maybe we could get him to choreograph for us.
translation.zh: 也许我们可以请他为我们编舞

translation.en: Yeah, Quinn, everybody knows Jake Taylor, all right?
translation.zh: 是啊 奎因人人都认识杰克泰勒 好吗？

translation.en: He was the best dancer in the state until he tore his ACL.
translation.zh: 他是全州最好的舞者直到他拉伤了前交叉韧带

translation.en: No one has seen or heard from him in, like, two years.
translation.zh: 已经有两年没人见过他了

translation.en: We'd have a better chance at building a time machine
translation.zh: 我们更有可能制造一个时间机器

translation.en: and kidnapping a young Channing Tatum.
translation.zh: 然后绑架年轻的查宁塔图姆

translation.en: -I found him. -[Jas] What? How?
translation.zh: -我找到他了-什么？怎么找到的？

translation.en: I checked his old Instagram,
translation.zh: 我看了他以前的照片墙

translation.en: checked all his geo-tags, and from there, it was just a simple mapping.
translation.zh: 看了他的地理标签然后简单绘制一下就搞定了

translation.en: Well, damn, Nancy Drew.
translation.zh: 厉害了 小侦探

translation.en: And now all we have to do is convince him.
translation.zh: 现在我们要做的 就是去说服他

translation.en: Convince this hot stranger you stalked to coach your non-existent dance team.
translation.zh: 说服你跟踪到的牛逼陌生人让他指导不存在的舞团

translation.en: Yeah, pretty much.
translation.zh: 是啊 差不多吧

translation.en: I'm sure Jake Taylor is onto much bigger and better things.
translation.zh: 我相信杰克泰勒在做更重要更靠谱的事

translation.en: -[boy] What was your favorite dance move? -[girl] Um, probably the one where…
translation.zh: -那是你最喜欢的舞步吗？-是啊…差不多吧…

translation.en: [boy] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Are you-- Are you Jake Taylor?
translation.zh: 你是杰克泰勒吗？

translation.en: Depends on who's asking.
translation.zh: 那要看是谁问了

translation.en: Right. Um, I-I'm Quinn…
translation.zh: 是哦 我叫奎因

translation.en: Ackerman.
translation.zh: 艾克曼

translation.en: And I'm starting a dance team at Woodbright High.
translation.zh: 我要在亮木高中组建舞团

translation.en: -I'm not interested. -So I just--
translation.zh: -我没兴趣-所以我…

translation.en: We would like you to be our choreographer for the following reasons.
translation.zh: 我们希望你能当我们的编舞原因如下

translation.en: One. According to my research of every dance movie ever made,
translation.zh: 首先 根据我对所有舞蹈电影的研究

translation.en: we have a very important ingredient for winning: a can-do spirit.
translation.zh: 我们拥有取胜的重要因素积极进取的精神

translation.en: [chuckles] That's uh… not how dance works.
translation.zh: 舞蹈不是这样跳的

translation.en: Well, that's why we would need you.
translation.zh: 所以我们才需要你

translation.en: No, I'm good.
translation.zh: 不了 还是算了吧

translation.en: Okay. Number two.
translation.zh: 好吧 第二点

translation.en: Um, this is your chance to overcome your demons,
translation.zh: 这是你战胜内心恶魔的机会

translation.en: due to your… knee injury.
translation.zh: 克服膝盖伤的影响

translation.en: Don't come back here.
translation.zh: 你以后不要再来了

translation.en: Okay, fine. We'll just win the Work It Dance Competition without you, then.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我们就只能抛弃你自己去赢得飙舞追梦大赛了

translation.en: And you won't go insane, you know,
translation.zh: 你也不会疯掉的

translation.en: being slowly eaten up by all that unrealized potential.
translation.zh: 因为尚未实现的潜力在将你慢慢吞噬

translation.en: Wait. Hold up.
translation.zh: 等等 先别走

translation.en: -Can-do spirit. -Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 积极进取的精神

translation.en: What about skill?
translation.zh: 那舞技呢？

translation.en: -We're extremely skilled. -[laughs] I can spot a fake anywhere.
translation.zh: 我们的舞技超炫的 我一眼就能认出冒牌货的

translation.en: Then you must know that I'm the real deal.
translation.zh: 我可是货真价实

translation.en: You dance? How long?
translation.zh: 你会跳舞？多久了？

translation.en: -Since I was ten. -Influences?
translation.zh: -十岁就开始了-受谁影响？

translation.en: Paul Taylor, Ashley Everett,
translation.zh: 保罗泰勒 阿什利埃弗雷特

translation.en: -Travis Wall-- -Look at you.
translation.zh: -特拉维斯沃尔-看看你

translation.en: The way you carry yourself, your posture. You're…100% not a dancer.
translation.zh: 你的举止 你的姿势你肯定不是舞者

translation.en: I still have time to learn.
translation.zh: 我还有时间学习的

translation.en: Why would you enter a competition
translation.zh: 你都不会跳舞为什么要参加跳舞大赛？

translation.en: -when you don't know how to dance? -Fair question.
translation.zh: 你都不会跳舞为什么要参加跳舞大赛？ 问得好我可能是对杜克大学招生老师撒谎了

translation.en: So I may have lied to the Duke college admissions officer,
translation.zh: 问得好我可能是对杜克大学招生老师撒谎了

translation.en: which means now I have to put my money where my mouth is.
translation.zh: 这就意味着 我必须说到做到

translation.en: Give up.
translation.zh: 放弃吧

translation.en: Go to community college. I-I can't help you.
translation.zh: 去社区大学吧 我帮不了你

translation.en: I don't give up.
translation.zh: 我不会放弃的

translation.en: [Quinn] Check it out. I made flyers.
translation.zh: 你来看看 我做了传单

translation.en: Okay. So, hey, the Thunderbirds have the best dancers at the school, right?
translation.zh: （免费零食！） 所以雷鸟有全校最棒的舞者 对吧？

translation.en: At least the ones who auditioned.
translation.zh: 至少那些海选的人都是

translation.en: -So we need to find-- -The diamonds in the rough.
translation.zh: -所以我们需要找到…-未经加工的钻石

translation.en: I was gonna say, "The ones who don't audition."
translation.zh: 我本来要说 “没参加海选的”

translation.en: But yeah, okay.
translation.zh: 不过是啊

translation.en: So there's this girl in my homeroom, all right?
translation.zh: 我的教室里有一个女孩 好吗？

translation.en: She makes these dance videos
translation.zh: 她拍了这些跳舞视频

translation.en: and posts them on Instagram. Check it out.
translation.zh: 发布到照片墙了 你来看看

translation.en: Um… I don't know, Jas. She seems… intense.
translation.zh: 我说不好 杰斯 她看起来…很有激情

translation.en: -She can dance. -["When I Get Going" by KALLICO playing]
translation.zh: 她会跳舞呢

translation.en: [goth girl] I don't believe in teams.
translation.zh: 我不相信团队

translation.en: Did you know that Friedrich Nietzsche was the starting number ten
translation.zh: 你知道吗？弗里德里希尼采在他18岁时

translation.en: for the German national football team when he was 18 years old?
translation.zh: 是德国国家足球队第10号首发队员

translation.en: Yeah, apparently that experience influenced a lot of his later work.
translation.zh: 是啊 显然那次经历影响了他后来的很多作品

translation.en: -♪ La la la, oh-oh ♪ -I don't really know what's going on here, -but take this. -♪ La la la, oh-oh ♪
translation.zh: 我不太清楚是什么情况不过给你传单吧

translation.en: Hm-mm. I see you. You got some moves.
translation.zh: 我看过你 你的舞步很厉害

translation.en: That's my victory dance.
translation.zh: 那是我的胜利之舞

translation.en: Okay, see, I didn't wanna be the one to tell you this, but you suck at soccer.
translation.zh: 好吧 我本来不想告诉你的但你踢得太烂了

translation.en: -No, I don't. -Yeah, you do.
translation.zh: -才没有-有的

translation.en: Yeah, well, you see, I ran the numbers,
translation.zh: 是啊 你要知道 我算了一下

translation.en: and the odds of the team actually playing you this season
translation.zh: 这个赛季 球队让你参赛的比率

translation.en: are ten to one, so…
translation.zh: 只有1/10 所以…

translation.en: Great practice, man!
translation.zh: 踢得漂亮 伙计！

translation.en: -Ouch. -Woof. Yeah, that was painful to watch.
translation.zh: -哎哟-唉唉 是啊 看着都很悲哀

translation.en: So you should be on a team that really respects your talent.
translation.zh: 你应该加入一个真正尊重你天赋的团队

translation.en: And first, you should start by doing something you're really good at.
translation.zh: 首先 你应该从做你擅长的事情开始

translation.en: ♪ When I get goin'… ♪
translation.zh: （混音带 5美元）

translation.en: [Jas] Everybody calls this kid DJ Tapes
translation.zh: 大家都叫他DJ泰普斯

translation.en: because he makes the hottest mix tapes around.
translation.zh: 他制作的混音带最抢手了

translation.en: But what they don't know is that he's got some serious moves.
translation.zh: 但大家不知道 他的舞步也很厉害

translation.en: Yeah, this guy is supposed to be the best flipper in town.
translation.zh: 没错 他是附近最厉害的空翻舞者

translation.en: [Quinn] He's, like, 50.
translation.zh: 他有50岁了吧

translation.en: [Jas] No, not him. The one that looks like Conan O'Brien.
translation.zh: 不是他啦是看起来像柯南奥布莱恩那人

translation.en: The guy can flip.
translation.zh: 这家伙很会空翻

translation.en: -It's not true. -[Jas] Mm… that's not what I heard.
translation.zh: 没有的事 大家都那么说

translation.en: I did one flip one time in eighth grade at Ryan Goodman's pool party.
translation.zh: 八年级时 我空翻过一次 是在瑞安古德曼的泳池派对

translation.en: -I heard it was perfect. -I don't even remember how I did it.
translation.zh: -据说动作很完美-我都忘记怎么做的了

translation.en: Right, but you did it once, which means you can do it again.
translation.zh: 是啊 但你做过一次 就能再做一次

translation.en: It's still somewhere inside of you. We just have to find it.
translation.zh: 这是潜藏在你内心深处的需要我们来挖掘

translation.en: You will flip again.
translation.zh: 你肯定能再次空翻的

translation.en: Catch you on the flip side.
translation.zh: 我们翻过这一页再见了

translation.en: [Quinn] Priya and I once did a presentation for physics class.
translation.zh: 普丽娅和我曾在物理课上做过演讲

translation.en: She skated in circles while I talked about the theory of centrifugal force.
translation.zh: 我谈论离心力理论 她在原地转圈

translation.en: Needless to say, we aced it,
translation.zh: 不用说 我们得了满分

translation.en: so she totally owes me.
translation.zh: 所以她欠我一个人情

translation.en: Two, two, three, four, five, six.
translation.zh: 二 三 四 五 六

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -I signed up online.
translation.zh: 你在这里做什么呢？ 我在网上报名的

translation.en: You realize this is a kids' class, right?
translation.zh: 你知道这是儿童课程吧？

translation.en: Yeah, well, there was no age limit on the website, so…
translation.zh: 是啊 但网站上没有年龄限制 所以…

translation.en: Great. You do you.
translation.zh: 行吧 那你继续

translation.en: [Jake] All right, here we go! Six, seven, eight.
translation.zh: 好了 开始吧！ 六 七 八

translation.en: One, two, three. [grunting]
translation.zh: 一 二 三

translation.en: We found some great new dancers to join our team.
translation.zh: 我们找到了一些优秀的新舞者加入队伍

translation.en: We'd still love to have you choreograph.
translation.zh: 我们还是希望你能来编舞

translation.en: -What do you think? -I think you still can't dance.
translation.zh: 你觉得呢？ 我还是觉得你不会跳舞

translation.en: All right. I didn't want to have to…
translation.zh: 好吧 其实我也不想…

translation.en: show you everything at once, but…
translation.zh: 一次性全都展示给你 但是…

translation.en: let's go for it, all right.
translation.zh: 我们开始吧 来了

translation.en: Please don't do that.
translation.zh: -拜托别这样了-好吧

translation.en: All right. Well, I still have the animations.
translation.zh: -拜托别这样了-好吧 我还会模仿呢

translation.en: No? Okay. Well, what about this one?
translation.zh: 不行吗？好吧 那这招呢？

translation.en: Step… [softly] drop, step…
translation.zh: 踏步 放下 踏步

translation.en: Uh-huh, you love it. You kinda like it.
translation.zh: 爱上了吧 有点喜欢了吧

translation.en: -No? -Ju--
translation.zh: 不喜欢吗？

translation.en: [Quinn softly] I'm stepping…
translation.zh: 我在踏步呢

translation.en: -then I drop. -Come here.
translation.zh: -然后放下-过来

translation.en: Stand right there.
translation.zh: 站在那边

translation.en: Look right here. [chuckles] Okay. Just-- Just follow me.
translation.zh: 看着镜子 好了 跟着我来

translation.en: Okay? We're gonna step to the right.
translation.zh: 好吗？ 我们向右踏步

translation.en: Seven, eight.
translation.zh: 七 八 踏步

translation.en: Step, drop. Step, drop.
translation.zh: 放下 踏步

translation.en: Step, drop-- Make it two movements. Step, then drop.
translation.zh: 放下 分两步动作 踏步 然后放下

translation.en: Kind of.
translation.zh: 差不多了

translation.en: Just keep doing it.
translation.zh: 继续

translation.en: All right, slow it down. Slow it down.
translation.zh: 好吧 慢一点

translation.en: Do you mind?
translation.zh: 你介意吗？

translation.en: Take it from the top.
translation.zh: 从头开始

translation.en: -[emotional music plays] -Seven, eight.
translation.zh: 七 八 踏步

translation.en: Step, drop. Nice.
translation.zh: 七 八 踏步 放下 很好 踏步

translation.en: Step, drop. You feel that?
translation.zh: 放下 能感受到吗？踏步

translation.en: Step, drop. That's good.
translation.zh: 放下 能感受到吗？踏步 放下 很好 踏步

translation.en: Step, drop. More power in your arms. Really bring it to you.
translation.zh: 放下 胳膊有点力量 用点力量 踏步

translation.en: Step, drop. Step, drop.
translation.zh: 放下 胳膊有点力量 用点力量 踏步 放下 踏步

translation.en: Step, drop. That's good. Step, drop.
translation.zh: 放下 踏步 放下 很好 踏步 放下

translation.en: Bring it to you, from out to your shoul-- There we go!
translation.zh: 用点力量 带动肩膀…非常好！

translation.en: Nice. Step, drop.
translation.zh: 很好 踏步 放下 踏步

translation.en: Step, drop. We're gonna ball change, all right?
translation.zh: 很好 踏步 放下 踏步 放下 再来脚掌换步 好吗？

translation.en: Drop, ball change.
translation.zh: 放下 脚掌换步

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay. Step, drop.
translation.zh: 好吧 踏步 放下

translation.en: That's good. Step, drop. Back the other way. Step, drop.
translation.zh: 非常棒 踏步 放下 另一侧换步 踏步 放下 然后…

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: 可恶！

translation.en: -Are you okay? -[grunts]
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: I'm fine. I'm fine. I'm fine.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: May I?
translation.zh: 我可以吗？

translation.en: [Quinn] I read about acupressure for your knee injury,
translation.zh: 我看过按摩治疗膝盖损伤的书

translation.en: and these points were recommended.
translation.zh: 书里建议按摩这些穴位

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢了

translation.en: Thank you… for the dance lesson.
translation.zh: 要谢谢你的舞蹈课

translation.en: Yeah, good. Your foot is comfortable,
translation.zh: 是的 很好 双脚放轻松了

translation.en: and your seat belt is on. Did you check your mirror?
translation.zh: 安全带也系好了 检查后视镜了吗？

translation.en: -What do you see? -Uh… a tree?
translation.zh: 你能看到什么？ 一棵树吗？

translation.en: Good job. Slow down.
translation.zh: 干得好 开慢点

translation.en: [sighs] So I took on a new extracurricular.
translation.zh: 我参加了一项新的课外活动

translation.en: Oh, yeah? What is it?
translation.zh: 是吗？什么活动？

translation.en: -Dance team. -Dance team?
translation.zh: -舞团-舞团吗？

translation.en: That sounds fun. It also sounds very time-consuming.
translation.zh: 听着很有趣 也很耗时间的样子

translation.en: Well, Einstein said, "Time is an illusion."
translation.zh: 爱因斯坦说 “时间是一种幻觉”

translation.en: Well, Einstein also said, "Worry about your GPA."
translation.zh: 爱因斯坦还说 “要小心分数下降”

translation.en: -That's a good one. -Okay, slow down.
translation.zh: -很好笑哈-好了 慢一点

translation.en: Yeah, keep it slow. Good job.
translation.zh: 是啊 保持低速 非常好

translation.en: So, um, you think I'm ready to leave the parking lot yet?
translation.zh: 你觉得我可以开出停车场了吗？

translation.en: [mom] Definitely not. At least another week.
translation.zh: 肯定不行 你还需要再练一周

translation.en: -[Quinn] You said that last week. -Okay.
translation.zh: -你上周就那么说-行吧

translation.en: You are so lucky you missed. Do it again, though. I dare you.
translation.zh: 没砸中算你们幸运再来一次啊 我看你敢不敢

translation.en: Eat me.
translation.zh: 你来试试啊

translation.en: Kids are disgusting.
translation.zh: 熊孩子太恶心了

translation.en: Okay, everybody.
translation.zh: 好了 各位

translation.en: You have each been chosen
translation.zh: 你们各位已被选中

translation.en: to be part of a brand-new dance crew.
translation.zh: 参加一个全新组建的舞团

translation.en: Name TBD.
translation.zh: 舞团名字待定

translation.en: What is TBD?
translation.zh: 待定是什么意思？

translation.en: It stands for "to be determined."
translation.zh: 就是尚无定论的意思不是舞团名字叫待定 只是…

translation.en: -That's not our real name. It's just-- -The flyer said there would be snacks.
translation.zh: 就是尚无定论的意思不是舞团名字叫待定 只是… 传单上说会有零食

translation.en: Which are also TBD as of right now.
translation.zh: 目前零食也在待定中

translation.en: Okay. Tapes?
translation.zh: 好了 泰普斯？

translation.en: -You're doing our music. -Dope.
translation.zh: -你负责音乐-没问题

translation.en: Raven, you're doing our costumes.
translation.zh: 瑞文 你负责做我们的服装

translation.en: How do you guys feel about dead cheerleaders?
translation.zh: 你们觉得亡灵啦啦队怎么样？

translation.en: -Quinn, you're doing our costumes. -I can do that.
translation.zh: -奎因 你来负责服装吧-可以有

translation.en: It says here "choreographer," and then it's blank.
translation.zh: 这里写着“编舞” 然后是空白

translation.en: Okay, um… might as well get into it.
translation.zh: 好的 马上就能解决了

translation.en: I'm going to get... Jake Taylor to be our choreographer.
translation.zh: 我要请杰克泰勒做我们的编舞

translation.en: -Didn't he die? -No. Here I am, alive and well.
translation.zh: -他不是死了吗？-没呢 我在这呢 活得好好的

translation.en: Look, um, I'm not gonna waste my time and name if you end up sucking,
translation.zh: 我不想浪费我的时间和名声万一你们搞砸了呢

translation.en: but I will make you a deal, okay?
translation.zh: 但我要跟你们做一个交易 好吗？

translation.en: If you guys can make it past qualifiers on your own…
translation.zh: 如果你们能凭借自己 通过资格赛

translation.en: I'll choreograph for you.
translation.zh: 我就来给你们编舞

translation.en: And if you need a place to rehearse for now, you can come to my studio.
translation.zh: 如果你们现在需要排练的地方可以来我的舞蹈教室

translation.en: As long as my boss isn't around, then you can do your thing there for free.
translation.zh: 只要我的老板不在 就可以免费提供给你们

translation.en: Wow, okay. Quick question.
translation.zh: 哇哦 好的 快问快答

translation.en: So, you drove all the way here
translation.zh: 所以你开车大老远而来

translation.en: just to tell us that you weren't going to waste your time on us?
translation.zh: 就为了告诉我们不愿意在我们身上浪费时间吗？

translation.en: Yeah, well, I-I wasn't doing anything right now. That's why… I could come.
translation.zh: 是啊 我现在也没什么事做 所以我才有时间来

translation.en: But generally, I stay pretty busy.
translation.zh: 但通常来说 我还是很忙的

translation.en: We'll just drop it.
translation.zh: 我们就不谈了

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna go.
translation.zh: 我要走了

translation.en: But... uh, yeah, the studio-- Just come around back when we close.
translation.zh: 不过舞蹈教室的事等我们关门 你们可以过来

translation.en: I have no clue. Roman left his shoes again, so…
translation.zh: 是啊 我也不知道罗曼又把鞋忘在这里了 所以…

translation.en: -Figure it out. -Figure that out. Okay, bye.
translation.zh: -你来解决吧-交给我吧 好的 拜拜

translation.en: -Come on! -Sweet!
translation.zh: -快！-好极了！

translation.en: Oops, my shoe.
translation.zh: 我的鞋！

translation.en: What are we doing here?
translation.zh: 我们来这里做什么？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I need a new mattress.
translation.zh: 我需要新床垫了

translation.en: I think it could add a nice little feng shui.
translation.zh: 我觉得可以让风水更好

translation.en: Oh, that mattress.
translation.zh: 那个床垫呀

translation.en: -You need to get some game, Quinn. -What do you mean by that?
translation.zh: -你要勇敢一点 奎因-什么意思？

translation.en: You think I don't see you staring at Jake like he's a pop quiz?
translation.zh: 你以为我没看到你盯着杰克的样子？像是在看突击测验

translation.en: -Untrue. -You just need to ask him out.
translation.zh: -才没有-你快约他出来吧

translation.en: -I don't even know how to do that. -It's easy!
translation.zh: -我都不知道怎么做-很简单！

translation.en: Just play it cool.
translation.zh: 耍酷就行了

translation.en: Like, check this out.
translation.zh: 来看我演示

translation.en: -[Jas] Hi. -[Quinn] Oh my God.
translation.zh: -嗨-我的天啊

translation.en: [salesman] I'll circle around and be with you in a few minutes.
translation.zh: 我再转一圈 过一会再回来

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿 抱歉久等了

translation.en: Sorry about the wait. H-How can I help you guys?
translation.zh: 嘿 抱歉久等了 -你们需要什么帮助吗？-你好呀

translation.en: Hi there. I am uh… looking for a new mattress.
translation.zh: -你们需要什么帮助吗？-你好呀 我想买新床垫

translation.en: Okay, great.
translation.zh: 好啊 那你就来对地方了

translation.en: -Well, you came to the right place. -I did, didn't I?
translation.zh: 好啊 那你就来对地方了 是哦 是吧？

translation.en: -Must be Mr. Right. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 你就是合适人选

translation.en: So, what are you thinking about,
translation.zh: 在硬度方面 你有什么要求？

translation.en: -in terms of firmness? -So many things.
translation.zh: 在硬度方面 你有什么要求？ 那就太多了

translation.en: Jesus.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Would you mind? I wanna test the spoon-worthiness -of this mattress. -Um…
translation.zh: 你介意吗？我想测试一下床垫的耐用度

translation.en: My friend here will move out of the way. Quinn?
translation.zh: 我的朋友可以躲开的 奎因？

translation.en: Why don't you just plop on down?
translation.zh: 你直接躺上来吧？

translation.en: -Just a tad. -[salesman] Yeah, okay. Sure, all right.
translation.zh: -就是测试一下-行啊 没问题 好的 这样测试呀

translation.en: This is how this works.
translation.zh: 好的 这样测试呀

translation.en: -Okay. This is… -This is good.
translation.zh: 好的 这样…

translation.en: -The firmness is… -The firmness of the bed is good. Yeah.
translation.zh: -硬度…-床垫的硬度很棒 是啊

translation.en: [Jas] Firmness of the bed. [salesman] I can't say I've done this before.
translation.zh: -床垫硬度-我以前没这样做过

translation.en: [Jas] This is a full experience.
translation.zh: 就要完整体验嘛

translation.en: [Quinn] You know, we still need a name.
translation.zh: 要知道 我们需要起名字的

translation.en: I think we should name the team "Jasss," with three S's.
translation.zh: 我觉得可以叫“杰斯斯斯” 三个斯

translation.en: We're not naming the team after you.
translation.zh: 我们才不会用你的名字起名呢

translation.en: It's not after me.
translation.zh: 不是我的名字

translation.en: It's like "Yas, queen,"
translation.zh: 就像是 “是啊 女王”

translation.en: but like "Jasss Quinn." It's cute, right?
translation.zh: 说成“杰斯女王” 很可爱 是吧？

translation.en: -What about "The Raptures"? -The Raptors are already a team, dummy.
translation.zh: 叫做“欢喜升天”怎么样？ -这名字跟另一只队伍很像 傻瓜-不是的

translation.en: No. Like, the Rapture?
translation.zh: 我是说 欢喜升天？

translation.en: It's like… It's like when people get sucked up into the sky,
translation.zh: 就像是提送信徒升天

translation.en: and the world's about to end. Like, it's really cool.
translation.zh: 世界将要毁灭 很酷的

translation.en: And all hell breaks loose on Earth, and, like--
translation.zh: 天塌地陷 灾难降临 -就像是…-好了 各位

translation.en: we need to perform in front of a live audience before qualifiers.
translation.zh: 在资格赛之前我们需要在现场观众面前表演

translation.en: That's true. The Birds practice all the time at pep rallies.
translation.zh: 是啊 雷鸟总在赛前动员会上表演的

translation.en: But who are we gonna perform for?
translation.zh: 但要给谁表演呢？

translation.en: [Quinn] We have our audience!
translation.zh: 我们的观众到位了

translation.en: So this is it?
translation.zh: 就这样吗？

translation.en: They're screening Fifty Shades of Grey in the media room.
translation.zh: 他们在媒体室放映《五十度灰》呢

translation.en: But I got Harold.
translation.zh: 但我请哈罗德来了

translation.en: 'Sup, Harold? You didn't wanna watch Fifty Shades of Grey?
translation.zh: 怎么了 哈罗德？你不想看《五十度灰》吗？

translation.en: -No, he's not allowed to watch it anymore. -Oh.
translation.zh: 是啊 他们不允许他再看了

translation.en: Not after what happened last time. Right, Harold?
translation.zh: 就因为上次的事 对吧 哈罗德？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Okay, come on guys! Let's do this.
translation.zh: 好啦 各位！我们开始吧

translation.en: What happened last time?
translation.zh: 上次发生了什么？

translation.en: Did he just fall asleep to Big Freedia?
translation.zh: 他听着比格福瑞达睡着了吗？

translation.en: No… No, he's-- Harold?
translation.zh: 没吧 他就是…哈罗德？

translation.en: Harold, did you-- Did you like it?
translation.zh: 哈罗德 你喜欢吗？

translation.en: Pretty sure the key to a live audience is keeping them alive.
translation.zh: 我敢肯定现场表演的关键是让观众活下去

translation.en: Poor Harold.
translation.zh: 可怜的哈罗德

translation.en: Why? Death comes to us all.
translation.zh: 怎么了？人终有一死

translation.en: You know, it could have been completely unrelated to our performance.
translation.zh: 这可能与我们的演出完全无关

translation.en: Quinn, our terrible dancing just killed a man.
translation.zh: 奎因 我们跳得太烂把那人都害死了 好吗？

translation.en: All right? The sooner we face that fact,
translation.zh: 我们越早面对这个事实

translation.en: the sooner we can ask for forgiveness and move on with our lives.
translation.zh: 就能越早请求原谅 继续我们的生活

translation.en: Well, then we need to work harder.
translation.zh: 那我们就需要加倍努力了

translation.en: -[ambulance siren blares] -Come on. Let's go.
translation.zh: 来吧 我们走吧

translation.en: Okay. Hey, Tapes? Would you mind playing a beat?
translation.zh: 很好 泰普斯？ 你介意打个节拍吗？

translation.en: Why don't we get up and try a freestyle? We loosen up a little bit.
translation.zh: 我们为什么不起来试试即兴舞蹈呢？ 我们稍微放松一点

translation.en: -[Quinn] Yeah, okay. Cool. -[Jas] We unbutton a button. Yeah.
translation.zh: -是啊 酷啊-松开一颗扣子 是啊

translation.en: -All right. -Let's try this. Hit it, Tapes.
translation.zh: 我们试试 开始吧 泰普斯

translation.en: -♪ Na na na na, na na na, na na na ♪ -[dancers whooping]
translation.zh: 好棒！

translation.en: [all] Go, Robby. Go, Robby. Go, Robby.
translation.zh: 来吧 罗比！

translation.en: Me? Yeah!
translation.zh: 我吗？好的！

translation.en: Okay, got it.
translation.zh: 很好 你可以的

translation.en: -You know, feel free to just get loose. -Yep.
translation.zh: 没事 随意放松 没错

translation.en: Okay, um…
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Jas] Yeah. Yeah okay.
translation.zh: 让我回到…

translation.en: -Quinn, you just gotta dance how you feel. -This is how I feel!
translation.zh: -奎因 你要跟着感觉跳-这就是我的感觉！

translation.en: All right. Hey, good rehearsal, everybody.
translation.zh: 好吧 排练很不错 各位

translation.en: Freestyling is about getting out of our heads,
translation.zh: 即兴舞蹈重在摆脱大脑控制

translation.en: and that's what we have to do at qualifiers this weekend.
translation.zh: 这也是我们在周末资格赛中要做的

translation.en: Keep working on it.
translation.zh: 继续努力吧

translation.en: I'm… gonna go pray.
translation.zh: 我…就祈祷着吧

translation.en: [Quinn] Ever since my interview, I'd been hoping I'd get into Duke early admission,
translation.zh: 自从面试后我就一直希望能被杜克大学提前录取

translation.en: but the night before qualifiers,
translation.zh: 但是在资格赛的前一天晚上

translation.en: I got an e-mail saying
translation.zh: 我收到了一封邮件

translation.en: that there would be no decision on my application until the spring.
translation.zh: 说我的申请要到春天才会有结果

translation.en: Ms. Ramirez was nice enough to include a personal note.
translation.zh: 拉米雷兹非常好心还附上了一封私人信件

translation.en: "Can't wait to see you dance at Work It!"
translation.zh: “等不及要看你在飙舞追梦大赛的表现了！”

translation.en: Yay.
translation.zh: 耶

translation.en: ♪ To stay and give it tonight ♪
translation.zh: （飙舞追梦大赛资格赛）

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: We signed up online.
translation.zh: 我们在网上注册了

translation.en: Name?
translation.zh: 名字？

translation.en: TBD.
translation.zh: 待定

translation.en: It's just temporary.
translation.zh: 只是临时的

translation.en: Changing rooms are in the back.
translation.zh: 更衣室在后面

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: All right. Let's go, guys. Come on.
translation.zh: 好了 我们走吧 各位 走吧

translation.en: [Jas] What was that? Yeah, that's a good idea. I'll tell him. You go ahead.
translation.zh: 什么？好主意呢我去告诉他 你们先去吧

translation.en: Hey, there, again. Uh, group consensus.
translation.zh: 你好啊 我们一致同意

translation.en: Our new name is "Jasss Quinn."
translation.zh: 我们的新名字叫“杰斯斯斯皇后”

translation.en: -That is J-A-S-S-S Quinn-- -TBD. Thank you.
translation.zh: -杰三个斯皇后-待定 谢谢

translation.en: -"Jasss Quinn." -[crowd applauding]
translation.zh: “杰斯斯斯皇后”

translation.en: Why do we look like a bunch of dental hygienists?
translation.zh: 为什么我们看起来像一群牙医？

translation.en: What? They're uniforms. I borrowed them from the nursing home.
translation.zh: 怎么了？这是他们的制服我从养老院借的

translation.en: We look like we're about to go run a blood drive.
translation.zh: 看着我们像要去组织献血

translation.en: Remind me to never to put you in charge of costumes ever again.
translation.zh: 提醒我别再让你负责服装了

translation.en: -Never worn a color before. -For the record, they were free.
translation.zh: 从没穿过有颜色的衣服 要知道 这可是免费的

translation.en: Nice costumes. Scrubs, very appropriate.
translation.zh: 很棒的服装 刷手服 很合适呢

translation.en: What are you guys doing here?
translation.zh: 你们来做什么？

translation.en: Yeah, what? Returning champions don't have to qualify.
translation.zh: 是啊 上届冠军不用参加资格赛呀

translation.en: Riri's on an Instagram break, so I thought I'd come and watch a train wreck.
translation.zh: 蕾哈娜最近不发照片墙了所以我想来看看火车失事

translation.en: And pretty soon, we're gonna have two things to celebrate.
translation.zh: 我们很快就能有两件值得庆祝的事了

translation.en: One being your elimination.
translation.zh: 一个就是你们的淘汰

translation.en: And Juilliard's auditioning for Juilliard -this weekend. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 茱莉亚周末要去茱莉亚音乐学院面试

translation.en: -Trinity, I told you not to say anything. -You literally told me to say that.
translation.zh: -崔妮蒂 告诉你不要说呢-是你让我说的呀

translation.en: Anyway, yes, my presence has been requested.
translation.zh: 总之呢 是的 他们让我去参加呢

translation.en: I guess they just want to see what all the fuss is about.
translation.zh: 估计他们想看看 为什么能如此轰动

translation.en: Anyway, break your legs.
translation.zh: 好了 祝你们好运吧

translation.en: [female announcer] Next up, we have a new dance team from Woodbright High: TBD.
translation.zh: 接下来是亮木高中的新舞团 待定

translation.en: -Well, this should be interesting. -["Rent" by Big Freedia playing]
translation.zh: 有好戏看了

translation.en: -They'll never make it. -[Trinity] No.
translation.zh: 他们没戏的

translation.en: [female announcer] That was TBD from Woodbright High.
translation.zh: 刚才是亮木高中的待定舞团

translation.en: And now for the judges' scores.
translation.zh: 现在请评委打分

translation.en: We have a six, a five, and a five.
translation.zh: 分数分别是六分 五分和五分

translation.en: Seems a little high for that.
translation.zh: 似乎有点高呢

translation.en: At least nobody died this time.
translation.zh: 至少这次没人死掉

translation.en: Five, five, six. Is that good?
translation.zh: 五五六 算好吗？

translation.en: Um, it's between us and the next crew performing,
translation.zh: 胜负要看下一组表演的舞团了

translation.en: so… if we beat them, then we're in.
translation.zh: 所以…如果能战胜他们 我们就晋级了

translation.en: -Raven are you-- Are you crying? -No!
translation.zh: -瑞文 你在哭吗？-没有！

translation.en: Oh God, please suck, please suck, please suck. Good luck!
translation.zh: 天啊 拜托糊掉 保佑啊！

translation.en: [female announcer] Next up from Big Bend High School, please welcome Rock Solid.
translation.zh: 接下来是大本德高中的坚如盘石舞团

translation.en: They're really good.
translation.zh: 他们很棒呀

translation.en: Are-- A-Are you seeing what I'm seeing?
translation.zh: 你也看到了吗？

translation.en: Boner.
translation.zh: 起来咯

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.zh: 我的天哦

translation.en: I think I made direct eye contact.
translation.zh: 我好像有直接眼神接触了

translation.en: -Wait. He's not wearing a dance belt. -Yeah, no shit, honey.
translation.zh: 等等 他没系舞蹈腰带 是啊 没有呢

translation.en: No, I mean the Work It code of conduct states
translation.zh: 不是 飙舞追梦大赛规则要求所有男性成员

translation.en: that all male team member are required
translation.zh: 不是 飙舞追梦大赛规则要求所有男性成员 在表演时 必须系舞蹈腰带

translation.en: -to wear a dance belt during performances. -Wait. So this means…?
translation.zh: 在表演时 必须系舞蹈腰带 等等 也就是说…？

translation.en: It means we're in.
translation.zh: 我们要晋级了

translation.en: We're in.
translation.zh: 我们晋级啦

translation.en: I sucked at qualifiers.
translation.zh: 我在资格赛 表现烂到透了

translation.en: I'm not kidding. When the judge held up his scorecard,
translation.zh: 我没开玩笑 裁判举起分数牌时

translation.en: this one was just looking into my soul.
translation.zh: 简直直击我的灵魂

translation.en: -Just directly into my soul. It was bad. -Come on, I'm sure it wasn't that bad.
translation.zh: -直击灵魂 太糟糕了-不至于那么糟吧

translation.en: -You guys made it through, though. -On a technicality.
translation.zh: -不过你们还是晋级了-因为技术性问题

translation.en: Well, technically, that counts.
translation.zh: 那也是晋级了

translation.en: Maybe you can just hide me in the back for Work It.
translation.zh: 飙舞追梦大赛时也许你可以把我藏在后面

translation.en: I could never hide you in the back.
translation.zh: 我永远没法把你藏在后面

translation.en: Come on. I want to show you this thing Jas told me about.
translation.zh: 走吧 我想给你看看杰斯告诉我的事

translation.en: So, what did you think?
translation.zh: 你怎么想？

translation.en: It was amazing.
translation.zh: 太厉害了

translation.en: It was amazing. I just…
translation.zh: 太厉害了 我简直…

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I miss dancing.
translation.zh: 我怀念跳舞

translation.en: So why'd you give it up?
translation.zh: 那为什么放弃呢？

translation.en: 'Cause I wanted to be the best…
translation.zh: 因为我想做最好的…

translation.en: and I wasn't any more, so…
translation.zh: 但我不再是最好的了 所以…

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: You're so good. I can't dance at all.
translation.zh: 你很棒啊 我都完全不会跳

translation.en: That's because you can't learn to dance by reading a book, Quinn.
translation.zh: 那是因为 看书没法学会跳舞的

translation.en: Why is Duke so important to you that you would do all of this?
translation.zh: 为什么杜克大学对你那么重要让你愿意做这些？

translation.en: I mean, it's just a school.
translation.zh: 我是说 一所学校而已

translation.en: My dad went there.
translation.zh: 我爸在那读书的

translation.en: He loved it.
translation.zh: 他很爱那里

translation.en: Like, really, really loved it.
translation.zh: 特别地爱

translation.en: I don't-- It wasn't always my plan to go.
translation.zh: 我本来没想去的

translation.en: But after he died,
translation.zh: 但他过世以后

translation.en: I felt like being there would make me connected to him somehow.
translation.zh: 我觉得去杜克大学能让我跟他建立某种联系

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe it sounds stupid.
translation.zh: 我不知道 也许有点傻吧

translation.en: No, it's not stupid, Quinn.
translation.zh: 并不傻的

translation.en: Plus, it's close to home.
translation.zh: 而且那里离家很近

translation.en: You know, my mom wouldn't have to be all by herself. And…
translation.zh: 我就不用让妈妈自己一个人了

translation.en: the more that I wanted it, the more that she wanted it.
translation.zh: 我越想去那里 她就越希望我去

translation.en: Now she's done everything to help me get this far.
translation.zh: 她帮助我很多 让我一路走到现在

translation.en: I feel like I can't let her down.
translation.zh: 我觉得我不能让她失望

translation.en: So are you doing this for her or for you?
translation.zh: 你是为了她 还是为了自己？

translation.en: [Quinn] Honestly, I don't really know.
translation.zh: 说实话 我也不知道

translation.en: It's just kind of taken on a life of its own now, but…
translation.zh: 自然而然就成现在这样了 但是…

translation.en: I have to do it.
translation.zh: 我必须这么做

translation.en: I think I know how to fix your freestyle problem.
translation.zh: 我知道如何解决你即兴舞蹈的问题了

translation.en: I wanna try something. Give me your jacket.
translation.zh: 我想试一种办法 把你的夹克给我

translation.en: O-Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: I wanna see if you can just…
translation.zh: 我想看看 你能不能…

translation.en: react to what I do.
translation.zh: 对我所做的 做出反应

translation.en: Oh, I don't remember signing up for a dance lesson tonight.
translation.zh: 我不记得我今晚报名舞蹈课了

translation.en: You're really gonna turn down a free lesson
translation.zh: 你真打算拒绝 全州最牛舞者的免费课程吗？

translation.en: from the best dancer in the state?
translation.zh: 全州最牛舞者的免费课程吗？

translation.en: Oh, I would never.
translation.zh: 那肯定不会

translation.en: -Do you know him? Is he coming? -[laughs] Okay.
translation.zh: 你认识他吗？他来了吗 ？ 好吧

translation.en: You don't have to be in control all the time.
translation.zh: 你不必时时刻刻都在掌控之中

translation.en: You're not studying for a midterm, all right?
translation.zh: 你不是在为期中考试备考 好吗？

translation.en: You can't think your way through this.
translation.zh: 你不能全程都在思考

translation.en: Quinn, you gotta…
translation.zh: 奎因 你必须…

translation.en: let your body drive you.
translation.zh: 把自己交给你的身体

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Show me what to do.
translation.zh: 告诉我怎么做吧

translation.en: So how's your knee? I read this article in The New England--
translation.zh: 你的膝盖怎么样了？我在《新英格兰医学杂志》上看到…

translation.en: [Female TED Talker] One of the first things we learn as children is how to tie our shoes.
translation.zh: 小时候 我们首先要学的一件事就是如何系鞋带

translation.en: But did you know that over the course of an 85-year lifespan,
translation.zh: 但你知道吗 如果活到85岁

translation.en: you'll spend 517 hours dealing with your shoelaces?
translation.zh: 那你要花517个小时处理鞋带？

translation.en: So, we did a study. We gave a group of 100 people clogs to wear, and--
translation.zh: 我们做了一项研究给100个人木屐让他们穿…

translation.en: ♪ …working less ♪
translation.zh: （杰克泰勒 早上好）

translation.en: Oh, oh. Are you okay? Oh, you're good. Get back up.
translation.zh: 你还好吗？没事的 快站起来

translation.en: [Jas] Yeah, you're good. It's okay. That's okay.
translation.zh: 是啊 完全没事 没问题的

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 很棒！

translation.en: [Jas] You're different.
translation.zh: 你不一样了

translation.en: You're glowing.
translation.zh: 容光焕发

translation.en: She's glowing!
translation.zh: 她容光焕发了！

translation.en: Okay, everybody. Let's do this.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 我们开始吧

translation.en: Why are we meeting here?
translation.zh: 为什么要在这里开会？

translation.en: Jake's studio was booked,
translation.zh: 杰克的舞蹈教室订出去了

translation.en: and this store is actually equidistant from the studio and the school.
translation.zh: 这间商店与舞蹈教室和学校的距离是相等的

translation.en: And it's very… very central to all of our homes.
translation.zh: 跟各位的家里 距离也差不多

translation.en: -You're welcome. -I think there's a coffee shop
translation.zh: 这条街上好像有一家咖啡店 我们…

translation.en: -down the street. Should we just-- -You know what, Raven, Miss Helpful?
translation.zh: 这条街上好像有一家咖啡店 我们… 谢谢帮忙 瑞文小姐

translation.en: There is actually a pot of coffee and a water cooler by the memory foam.
translation.zh: 记忆海绵床垫旁边有一壶咖啡和一台饮水机

translation.en: Okay, I think we're getting a little off topic,
translation.zh: 好了 我觉得我们有点跑题了

translation.en: so I'm gonna let Jake take the floor now.
translation.zh: 请杰克来发言吧

translation.en: Okay. Hi, everybody. Hello. Listen up.
translation.zh: 好的 各位 大家好 听我说

translation.en: There's less than two months until the competition,
translation.zh: 距离比赛还有不到两个月

translation.en: so we're already behind.
translation.zh: 所以我们已经落后了

translation.en: And we're going on a technicality.
translation.zh: 我们还有一些技术细节问题

translation.en: Bottom line, we have to be better.
translation.zh: 至少我们的舞技还要再精进

translation.en: If you wanna be your best, you have to follow your--
translation.zh: 如果想做最好的 就要遵从你的…

translation.en: Pecs.
translation.zh: 胸肌

translation.en: …heart.
translation.zh: 内心

translation.en: -Is she good? Are we good? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -她没事吧？我们没事吧？-是啊

translation.en: -She seems-- Okay. -Keep going. Hey, you.
translation.zh: -她似乎…好吧-你继续说 你呀

translation.en: We're gonna reel it in.
translation.zh: 我们得控制自己

translation.en: For me?
translation.zh: 为了我 好吗？

translation.en: Look, it's no secret that you guys aren't the most…
translation.zh: 听着 人人都知道 你们不是最…

translation.en: technically skilled dancers out there,
translation.zh: 技术娴熟的舞者

translation.en: but that's what we're up against.
translation.zh: 但那就是我们要面对的

translation.en: Okay? The Work It stage, it's different. It's-It's-It's huge.
translation.zh: 好吗？飙舞追梦大赛的舞台很不一样那是很大的舞台

translation.en: [Jake in speaking background] It's gonna be hard. Very, very hard.
translation.zh: 会很不容易的 非常非常不容易

translation.en: -♪ I need ooh la la la la ♪ -[salesman] Jas? Jas?
translation.zh: 杰斯？

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿-嘿

translation.en: Hey, so my manager told me that you guys gotta leave.
translation.zh: 我的经理告诉我 你们得走了

translation.en: Oh. Okay, yeah.
translation.zh: 好的 可以

translation.en: He also told me that you can't come back here anymore
translation.zh: 他还跟我说 你们不能再来这里了

translation.en: if you're not gonna buy anything.
translation.zh: 如果你们什么都不买的话

translation.en: -Personally, like, I don't care, but-- -[Jas] No, it's okay. I get it.
translation.zh: -其实我不介意的 但是…-没事的 我懂的

translation.en: Thank you for letting us be here, though.
translation.zh: 还是谢谢你让我们来

translation.en: On the other hand, if you ever need anything, you just call me.
translation.zh: 不过如果你需要什么可以打电话给我

translation.en: That's my card, my personal number.
translation.zh: 这是我的名片 我的电话号码

translation.en: -I will. It'll be mattress-related. -All right. I'll hold you to that.
translation.zh: 好的 有床垫需求 我就找你 好的 等着你哦

translation.en: I will use this.
translation.zh: 我会用到的

translation.en: Let's roll out.
translation.zh: 好了 我们走吧 不过我需要再坐一会

translation.en: -I'm gonna sit here for a second. -[Raven] That was weird.
translation.zh: 好了 我们走吧 不过我需要再坐一会 好吧 太古怪了

translation.en: [Quinn] "Dear Ms. Ramirez, thank you for the update on my application.
translation.zh: “亲爱的拉米雷兹老师 谢谢您告知我申请的进展

translation.en: I have a confession to make. I am not a Thunderbird.
translation.zh: 我要跟您坦白 我并不是雷鸟的人

translation.en: I have started my own dance team,
translation.zh: 我自己组建了一个舞团

translation.en: led by award-winning choreographer Jake Taylor.
translation.zh: 由一流编舞杰克泰勒领衔

translation.en: We'll be performing at the Work It Dance Competition in a few weeks.
translation.zh: 几周后 我们要在飙舞追梦大赛表演

translation.en: See you there, and hopefully again in the fall at Duke.
translation.zh: 到时候见 也希望秋天能在杜克再见

translation.en: -Sincerely, Quinn Ackerman." -[laptop swooshes]
translation.zh: 致敬 奎因艾克曼”

translation.en: -Good morning. -Good morning.
translation.zh: -早上好-早上好

translation.en: Is it just me or have you grown, like, two inches in the last two weeks?
translation.zh: 是我看错了还是你这两周长高了两英寸？

translation.en: I think it's just posture, Mom.
translation.zh: 我觉得只是姿势问题 妈妈

translation.en: So, I was thinking, who do we know that went to Duke that could help us?
translation.zh: 我一直在想 我们认识哪位杜克校友能帮助我们？

translation.en: I don't need anyone's help.
translation.zh: 我不需要别人的帮助

translation.en: I just don't understand why they're taking so long.
translation.zh: 我搞不明白 为什么还没有消息

translation.en: Didn't she say you were like a shoo-in?
translation.zh: 她不是说你是稳操胜券吗？

translation.en: No, you said I was a shoo-in.
translation.zh: 不 是你说我稳操胜券

translation.en: She said I would make an excellent addition.
translation.zh: 她说我很符合杜克大学的标准

translation.en: Either way, they should not lead you on like that.
translation.zh: 无论如何 他们都不应该那样引导你

translation.en: -I've got it covered. Don't worry. -Why are you so chill about this?
translation.zh: -尽在掌握啦 别担心-你为什么这么淡定？

translation.en: I just realized I have to go. I'll see you later.
translation.zh: 我突然想到 我得走了 回头见

translation.en: Bye. Oh, you know what?
translation.zh: 拜拜 你知道吗？

translation.en: My gynecologist is a Dukie.
translation.zh: 我的妇科医生是杜克毕业的

translation.en: Jake Taylor?
translation.zh: 杰克泰勒？

translation.en: It's definitely him.
translation.zh: 绝对是他

translation.en: So hot.
translation.zh: 帅呆了

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: So Jas is dancing to Jake Taylor's choreography.
translation.zh: 所以杰克泰勒要给杰斯编舞了

translation.en: God, this is exactly what I needed today.
translation.zh: 天啊 这正是我今天想要听到的

translation.en: [Brit] What happened with your Juilliard audition?
translation.zh: 茱莉亚音乐学院的面试怎么样？

translation.en: Oh, I don't know, Britney. Why don't you mind your damn business?
translation.zh: 我不知道 布瑞特你还是管好自己的事吧

translation.en: Sorry, it's just that they said conservatory dancing is different,
translation.zh: 对不起 只是他们说学院舞蹈是不一样的

translation.en: and if I want to be taken seriously,
translation.zh: 如果我想被认真对待

translation.en: I would need to learn to control my fire.
translation.zh: 我就要学着控制我的激情

translation.en: [Brit] Oh, it's okay.
translation.zh: 没事啦

translation.en: [Brit] I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 真对不起

translation.en: Wait. What? Don't be sorry for me. Be sorry for them.
translation.zh: 等等 什么？不要为我遗憾 是他们的遗憾

translation.en: Yeah, I would die before I extinguish my flames for some stuffy-ass school.
translation.zh: 是啊 那种古板的学校我才不会为了他们压抑自己的激情

translation.en: You don't want this? You don't want that?
translation.zh: 不想要这样吗？不想要这样吗？

translation.en: You don't want this fire? Your loss.
translation.zh: 不想要我的激情吗？那是你的损失

translation.en: Their loss.
translation.zh: -他们的损失-你知道谁不是茱莉亚毕业的吗？

translation.en: You know who else didn't go to Juilliard? Cardi B.
translation.zh: -他们的损失-你知道谁不是茱莉亚毕业的吗？ 卡迪B

translation.en: Bruno Mars, Jamiroquai, Janelle Monáe, Janet Jackson, Oprah, Obama.
translation.zh: 布鲁诺马尔斯 杰米罗奎 加奈尔莫奈珍妮杰克逊 奥普拉 奥巴马

translation.en: Lots of people.
translation.zh: 很多人

translation.en: So I'm fine.
translation.zh: 所以我没事的

translation.en: Do we still call him Juilliard?
translation.zh: 那我们还要叫他茱莉亚吗？

translation.en: [woman] Quinn, you can do better than this.
translation.zh: 奎因 你的成绩不该是这样的

translation.en: [Jas] Dude!
translation.zh: 姐们！

translation.en: Robby can flip!
translation.zh: 罗比可以空翻了！

translation.en: -[mouths word] -[Jas] He flipped!
translation.zh: 他翻过去了！

translation.en: Robby! Whoo! [laughing] [Jas] Come on! Come on!
translation.zh: 来啊！

translation.en: [Juilliard] All right. Now that we've saged the space,
translation.zh: 好了 我们给这里焚过香了

translation.en: let's try to adjust this terrible lighting.
translation.zh: 试着调整一下糟糕的灯光吧

translation.en: Brit, Trinity, can you help me find the switches, please?
translation.zh: 布瑞特 崔尼蒂能帮我找找开关在哪吗？

translation.en: Where's Jake?
translation.zh: 杰克在哪里？

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你们在这里做什么？

translation.en: -We booked the studio. -[Quinn] What?
translation.zh: -舞蹈教室被我们订了-什么？

translation.en: You know you have to actually pay to use a dance studio, right?
translation.zh: 使用舞蹈教室需要花钱 你知道吧？

translation.en: Otherwise, people get fired.
translation.zh: 否则员工就会被炒鱿鱼

translation.en: Jake!
translation.zh: 杰克！

translation.en: Are you kidding me?
translation.zh: 你跟我开玩笑吧？

translation.en: -Jake, everything's gonna be okay. -How?
translation.zh: -杰克 一切都会没事的-怎么可能？

translation.en: How is it gonna be okay?
translation.zh: 怎么会没事呢？

translation.en: Quinn, I just got fired.
translation.zh: 奎因 我刚被炒鱿鱼了

translation.en: I need this job. How am I gonna pay my rent?
translation.zh: 我需要这份工作 不然怎么付房租？

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 可恶

translation.en: Is that how you want to play this, you little psychopath?
translation.zh: 你想这么玩吗 你是神经病吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Your outburst is really eating into our rehearsal time, sweetie.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你的愤怒占用我们的排练时间了

translation.en: You seriously felt so threatened by us that you had to sabotage our team?
translation.zh: 你觉得我们是威胁必须破坏我们的团队吗？

translation.en: I didn't do anything. You do that all on your own.
translation.zh: 我什么都没做 是你们咎由自取

translation.en: See, I still remember when we were freshmen,
translation.zh: 听着 我还记得我们高一的时候

translation.en: and you didn't make the Birds.
translation.zh: 你都没能加入雷鸟

translation.en: But you begged,
translation.zh: 但你乞求高年级

translation.en: and you did the seniors' homework and washed their cars.
translation.zh: 帮他们做作业 帮他们洗车

translation.en: Flank me. Flank me, flank me.
translation.zh: 到我旁边来

translation.en: You know, a lot's changed, Jas. Now everyone washes my car.
translation.zh: 你要知道 很多事情都变了 杰斯 现在是别人替我洗车了

translation.en: It's so clean, you could eat sushi off it. I did it once.
translation.zh: -超级干净 都可以盛寿司吃-我用过一次

translation.en: Well, enjoy your poke off your Prius while you can.
translation.zh: 那就趁着还有机会赶紧用普锐斯吃你的寿司吧

translation.en: This is not over.
translation.zh: 我们没完

translation.en: And you look like a tampon commercial.
translation.zh: 你们看着像是卫生棉的广告

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: [Jas] Oh, ho, it's on now. -Oh, we're taking him down. -[Tapes] Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: 要开始正面交锋了 我们要打倒他们

translation.en: Hey. Where's Jake?
translation.zh: 嘿 杰克去哪了？

translation.en: [Quinn] Over the next few days, I reached out to Jake a bunch of times,
translation.zh: 接下来几天 我联系过杰克几次

translation.en: and I waited for him to text me back, but he never did.
translation.zh: 我在等他回短信 但没有等到

translation.en: Meanwhile, all the time I had put into the dance team had wrecked my GPA.
translation.zh: 与此同时 练舞耗费很多时间让我的成绩直线下降

translation.en: And that's when I got the e-mail.
translation.zh: 这时候 我收到了那封邮件

translation.en: "As of January 22nd, I will no longer be working
translation.zh: “从1月22日起 我将不再继续

translation.en: in the Duke University admissions department.
translation.zh: 在杜克大学招生办工作了

translation.en: If this is in regards to an application, please contact our office directly."
translation.zh: 有任何申请事宜请直接联系我们的办公室”

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [repeating] No.
translation.zh: 不要

translation.en: [Ms. Ramirez] -Hello? -Thank God. Hi!
translation.zh: -喂？-谢天谢地 嗨！

translation.en: Ms. Ramirez, it is-- It's Quinn Ackerman from Woodbright High.
translation.zh: 拉米雷兹老师我是亮木高中的奎因艾克曼

translation.en: Uh, you probably don't remember me. I'm the dancer.
translation.zh: 你可能不记得我了 我是那位舞者

translation.en: Oh yeah, the illuminator. How ya doin'? You keeping it lit?
translation.zh: 是哦 照明者你怎么样？在继续让舞台发光吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Um, so, I saw the e-mail that you sent.
translation.zh: 是啊 我看到你发来的邮件了

translation.en: What's that about? What's happening over there?
translation.zh: 什么情况？你那边怎么了？

translation.en: Yeah. I'll tell you what's happening here… Nothing.
translation.zh: 是哦 我来跟你说说 什么事都没有

translation.en: [Quinn] What happened to… shaking things up?
translation.zh: 不是说要…做出改变吗？

translation.en: Yeah. You know what? They really weren't into that.
translation.zh: 是啊 你知道吗 他们不感兴趣呢

translation.en: What can I say? I tried.
translation.zh: 我能说什么呢？我试过了

translation.en: [Quinn] You tried?
translation.zh: 你试过了？

translation.en: I learned how to dance.
translation.zh: 我都去学跳舞了

translation.en: [Ms. Ramirez] I'm sorry. Wait. What did you say?
translation.zh: 抱歉 等等 你刚才说什么？

translation.en: I started a dance team for you.
translation.zh: 我为了你 组建了一个舞团

translation.en: Good for you, girl. You blew up the box.
translation.zh: 厉害啊 姑娘 你把盒子炸掉了

translation.en: No, I blew up my life.
translation.zh: 不 我把我的生活炸掉了

translation.en: You didn't blow up your life. You blew up your box.
translation.zh: 你没把生活炸掉 你是把盒子炸掉了

translation.en: What does that mean?
translation.zh: 这是什么意思？

translation.en: -[guard clears throat] -I gotta go.
translation.zh: 我要挂了 我都把保安招来了

translation.en: -It's turning into a whole thing. -No, you don't have to--
translation.zh: 我要挂了 我都把保安招来了 不行 你不能…

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不要啊

translation.en: Shit! Shit!
translation.zh: 可恶！

translation.en: [mom] A half-day suspension? What if Duke finds out?
translation.zh: 停课半天？如果杜克知道了 那可怎么办？

translation.en: I know. I had a bad day, and the dance team--
translation.zh: 我知道 我过得很糟 而且舞团…

translation.en: Ever since you started dancing, you have been completely off-balance.
translation.zh: 自从你开始跳舞你就完全失去平衡了

translation.en: Your grades have been dropping. You're home late. I...
translation.zh: 你的成绩在下滑 很晚才回家 我…

translation.en: I don't understand why you felt the need to have this whole other hobby
translation.zh: 我不明白你为什么觉得 需要另外找一项爱好

translation.en: that has nothing to do
translation.zh: 而且这项爱好

translation.en: with what we've been working towards this whole time.
translation.zh: 跟我们一直的努力方向毫无关系

translation.en: Mom, I lied to you.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我撒谎了

translation.en: -What? -I lied because the Duke interview was not going as well as I said it was,
translation.zh: 我撒谎了 因为杜克的面试并没有像我说的那样顺利

translation.en: and the admissions lady brought up the Thunderbirds,
translation.zh: 招生老师提起雷鸟舞团

translation.en: so I made her think I was on the team…
translation.zh: 所以我让她以为 我是雷鸟的成员

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -…though I only do lighting.
translation.zh: -你在说什么？-虽然我只是负责灯光的

translation.en: So then Jas and I decided to make our own team…
translation.zh: 所以我和杰斯决定自己组建舞团…

translation.en: -Stop. -…then today I found out
translation.zh: -别说了-然后今天 我发现招生老师不在那里工作了

translation.en: the admissions lady doesn't work there anymore.
translation.zh: 我发现招生老师不在那里工作了

translation.en: I don't understand. So is it over? Is it done?
translation.zh: 我不明白所以结束了吗？都完了吗？

translation.en: I still have another month to resubmit my grades,
translation.zh: 我还有一个月时间补交成绩

translation.en: but they've gotten…
translation.zh: 但分数已经…

translation.en: pretty bad, and the suspension is…
translation.zh: 很糟糕了 加上停课

translation.en: not good.
translation.zh: 不是很妙

translation.en: I'm really sorry, Mom.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 妈妈

translation.en: Oh, man.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没事的

translation.en: We're gonna figure this out.
