translation.zh: 我们会想出办法的

translation.en: You're gonna buckle down and focus on your school work,
translation.zh: 你先认真学习 专注于学业

translation.en: and you're gonna pull those grades up.
translation.zh: 你会把成绩提高上去的

translation.en: You know what this means, though?
translation.zh: 但你知道这意味着什么吧？

translation.en: So you're just gonna quit on us? Just like that?
translation.zh: 所以你就这样退出了吗？就这样吗？

translation.en: I really need to get my grades up.
translation.zh: 我真心需要提高成绩

translation.en: Plus, I'm the worst dancer on the team. You guys don't really need me. And…
translation.zh: 而且我是舞技最差的你们不需要我的

translation.en: I'm holding you guys back. I'm the weak link.
translation.zh: 我在拖你们后腿 我是薄弱环节

translation.en: Yeah. And we stuck by you.
translation.zh: 是啊 但我们还是支持你

translation.en: Jas…
translation.zh: 杰斯…

translation.en: I did all of this for you, Quinn.
translation.zh: 我做这些 都是为了你 奎因

translation.en: I quit the Birds for you. You begged me to.
translation.zh: 我为了你 退出雷鸟 是你求我来着

translation.en: And what? Just 'cause your mom says you have to, you're gonna bail on us?
translation.zh: 然后呢 就因为你妈那么说你就要弃我们而去吗？

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: For a second, I thought you cared, and you weren't just using all of us.
translation.zh: 要知道 我曾以为 你是真心在乎 并不是利用我们

translation.en: I do care. I still care.
translation.zh: 我确实在乎 现在也在乎

translation.en: You know, I really hope you get into Duke, Quinn.
translation.zh: 我真心祝愿你能进杜克大学 奎因

translation.en: And I hope it was worth losing your only friend over.
translation.zh: 我希望这值得你失去好闺蜜

translation.en: Ja-- Jas?
translation.zh: 杰斯？

translation.en: Jas? Jas!
translation.zh: 杰斯？

translation.en: Guys, wh--[exhales]
translation.zh: 各位 怎么…

translation.en: You don't hate me?
translation.zh: 你不恨我吗？

translation.en: No, I do. I just need to update my Instagram story.
translation.zh: 恨的 不过我要更新照片墙

translation.en: Are you filming me right now?
translation.zh: 你在拍我吗？

translation.en: You've been filming this whole time?
translation.zh: 你一直在拍摄吗？

translation.en: Stop that.
translation.zh: 别拍了

translation.en: That's it. It's over.
translation.zh: 就这样了 结束了

translation.en: Priya Singh, signing off.
translation.zh: 普丽娅辛哈 录制完毕

translation.en: Quinn, I saw Priya's Instagram. You can't quit.
translation.zh: 奎因 我看到普丽娅的照片墙了你不能退出呀

translation.en: You can't ghost me and then tell me what to do.
translation.zh: 你不能突然消失 然后又来说教

translation.en: You're right. I was upset, and that's no excuse,
translation.zh: 你是对的 我很难过 这不是借口

translation.en: but you have to listen. Don't walk away from this.
translation.zh: 但你听我一句 不要放弃舞蹈

translation.en: They'll be better off without me, okay?
translation.zh: 没有我 他们会更好的

translation.en: Everyone is counting on you. You can't bail on them.
translation.zh: 大家都指望你呢 你不能抛弃他们

translation.en: You're lecturing me about quitting?
translation.zh: 你还教育我不要退出吗？

translation.en: Look... I made a promise to my mom.
translation.zh: 听着 我跟我妈保证了

translation.en: I don't have time for dance anymore.
translation.zh: 我没时间再跳舞了

translation.en: And I-- I really don't have time for a boyfriend.
translation.zh: 我也没时间谈男朋友了

translation.en: -[music ends] -[TV] Still waiting?
translation.zh: 还在等待吗？

translation.en: This show's garbage. I like Queer Eye. I love Queer Eye.
translation.zh: 这节目太垃圾了 我喜欢粉雄救兵 最爱粉雄救兵了

translation.en: It makes me cry every time. I wish they'd come here.
translation.zh: 每次都会感动到哭希望他们能来这里

translation.en: Give me a makeover.
translation.zh: 给我改造一下

translation.en: So what's all that, honey?
translation.zh: 所以你在做什么 宝贝？

translation.en: Um… it's just chemistry, biology.
translation.zh: 化学和生物

translation.en: You shouldn't be spending Friday night in this funeral home reading textbooks.
translation.zh: 周五晚上 你不应该来养老院看书

translation.en: You should be out with your friends, getting into trouble.
translation.zh: 你应该跟朋友一起 惹惹祸

translation.en: Yeah, well, I've got plenty of trouble and no friends.
translation.zh: 是啊 我惹很多祸了 也没朋友了

translation.en: And the only chance I have now at getting into a decent college is…
translation.zh: 我现在想要进入一所像样的大学 就只能靠看书了

translation.en: by reading these textbooks.
translation.zh: 就只能靠看书了

translation.en: Look at me. You see that guy over there?
translation.zh: 看着我 你看到那边的人了吗？

translation.en: Max Berman. Harvard Law School.
translation.zh: 马克斯伯曼 哈佛大学法学院

translation.en: -Argued two cases to the Supreme Court. -Wow.
translation.zh: -在最高法院出庭过两次-哇哦

translation.en: And Penny Kitz ran the cardiology department at UNC.
translation.zh: 佩妮基茨 在北卡罗来纳大学医院负责心脏病科

translation.en: And look at them now.
translation.zh: 看看他们现在

translation.en: We all end up in the same place… in a nursing home,
translation.zh: 我们最终都来到一个地方 养老院

translation.en: falling asleep in front of crappy TV.
translation.zh: 看着垃圾电视节目入睡

translation.en: And the only memories we have are the ones that were, like, really fun.
translation.zh: 我们仅存的记忆 就是那些开心的事

translation.en: You know, the times we spent with our friends,
translation.zh: 你懂的 跟朋友一起的时光

translation.en: not the schoolwork or the textbooks.
translation.zh: 不是作业或课本

translation.en: I talk too much.
translation.zh: 我说太多了

translation.en: I felt it! The thing you were talking about,
translation.zh: 我感受到了！你跟我说的那种感觉

translation.en: about getting out of my head and dancing.
translation.zh: 摆脱大脑掌控 随性舞蹈

translation.en: I literally was, like, stamping books, and it just started happening,
translation.zh: 我本来在给书盖章 突然就感受到了

translation.en: and I got out of my head, and I can dance.
translation.zh: 我摆脱大脑控制了 我会跳舞了

translation.en: Quinn, whoa, slow down.
translation.zh: 奎因 哇哦 慢一点

translation.en: And I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry if I hurt you.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 如果伤害你了 我跟你道歉

translation.en: -It's okay. -No, it's not, 'cause I…
translation.zh: -没事的-不 因为我…

translation.en: I thought that dancing would get me into Duke,
translation.zh: 我以为跳舞能让我被杜克大学录取

translation.en: and Duke was gonna make me happy.
translation.zh: 杜克大学能让我开心

translation.en: But dancing makes me really happy.
translation.zh: 但跳舞让我特别开心

translation.en: And so do you.
translation.zh: 你也是

translation.en: What are the odds of... getting the TBDs back together?
translation.zh: 让待定舞团重聚的几率有多少呢？

translation.en: I'm gonna have to see you dance first.
translation.zh: 我要先看看你的舞步

translation.en: -Yeah. Ready? Start with a little… -Yeah. Go for it.
translation.zh: -是啊 准备好了吗？-是啊 开始吧

translation.en: -Okay, all right. -Just a little…
translation.zh: -好吧 很好-来一点…

translation.en: You got a little swimming something happening here.
translation.zh: 游泳的感觉 很有感觉呢 还是非常不错的

translation.en: That's actually really nice.
translation.zh: 还是非常不错的

translation.en: [Quinn whispering] All right. Come on, guys. Come on in.
translation.zh: 各位 进来吧

translation.en: [speaking normally] Welcome to your new rehearsal space.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到新的排练场地

translation.en: I can feel Harold's ghost in here.
translation.zh: 我能感受到哈罗德的灵魂

translation.en: What about all the old people?
translation.zh: 那些老人怎么办？

translation.en: Everyone here is usually in bed by 7:00,
translation.zh: 他们通常七点睡觉

translation.en: so as long as we keep the noise down and don't disturb any of the residents,
translation.zh: 所以只要我们小点声 不要打扰老人

translation.en: we can rehearse here in the evenings.
translation.zh: 我们就可以晚上在这里排练了

translation.en: -Seriously? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-是啊

translation.en: [Quinn] And guys, I know I said I was quitting, but I--
translation.zh: 各位 我知道 我说要退出 但我…

translation.en: Nobody believed that.
translation.zh: 没人相信的

translation.en: Yeah. After I heard you crying in the bathroom last week,
translation.zh: 是啊 上周听到你在厕所哭泣之后

translation.en: I texted Priya to start stretching again.
translation.zh: 我就发给普丽娅 让她继续做拉伸

translation.en: -That's right. She did. -Oh, mm… That's funny. I wasn't crying.
translation.zh: 是啊 没错 很好笑哈 我没有哭呢

translation.en: [whispers] It kinda sounded like you.
translation.zh: 听着很像你

translation.en: You know what? Doesn't matter. Doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？无所谓了

translation.en: Let's get started.
translation.zh: 我们开始吧

translation.en: Okay, uh, here's the plan.
translation.zh: 好了 计划是这样的

translation.en: In the next few weeks,
translation.zh: 未来几周里

translation.en: you're all gonna be learning each other's styles, all right?
translation.zh: 你们要学习彼此的风格 好吗？

translation.en: -Five, six, seven, eight. -["Satisfied" by Galantis playing]
translation.zh: 五 六 七 八

translation.en: Turn that shit up!
translation.zh: 把声音开大一点！

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Quinn, I am on the toilet!
translation.zh: 奎因 我在上厕所呢！

translation.en: I know, but this is the only place I could talk to you alone.
translation.zh: 我知道 但只有在这里才能单独跟你说话

translation.en: Listen, I've made a lot of mistakes over the past few months.
translation.zh: 听着 过去几个月 我犯了很多错

translation.en: Can we please talk about this later?
translation.zh: 我们能以后再聊吗？

translation.en: But the mistake I regret most of all is hurting you.
translation.zh: 但我最后悔的 就是伤害你

translation.en: -I'm drowning you out with my pee. -[urinating]
translation.zh: 我要用尿把你淹死

translation.en: Okay, I'm done.
translation.zh: 好了 尿完了

translation.en: -Look, I'm really sorry-- -[hand dryer whooshes]
translation.zh: 听着 我非常抱歉…

translation.en: -I said I'm so-- -[hand dryer whooshes]
translation.zh: 我说我很…

translation.en: Okay, I'm sorry. Ew, how are your hands still wet?
translation.zh: 好吧 抱歉 你的手怎么还是湿的？

translation.en: -God, I miss paper towels. -Okay, listen,
translation.zh: 天啊 我好怀念厕纸 听着 待定舞团回归了 杰克回归了

translation.en: the TBDs are in, Jake is in,
translation.zh: 听着 待定舞团回归了 杰克回归了

translation.en: and we're still training for the competition.
translation.zh: 我们还在为比赛训练

translation.en: Look, I understand if you don't wanna come back, 'cause…
translation.zh: 如果你不想回来了 我也能理解

translation.en: after the way I acted, I don't blame you.
translation.zh: 因为…是我犯错在先 我不怪你

translation.en: But I just want you to know that you deserve to dance
translation.zh: 但我想让你知道 你应该跟我们一起

translation.en: with a group of people that actually care about you.
translation.zh: 你应该跟关心你的人一起跳舞

translation.en: I'm gonna use the bathroom. I've had to pee this whole time.
translation.zh: 我要去厕所了 一直憋着尿呢

translation.en: [Juilliard] I do not know what to say. Absolutely everything you did was a fail.
translation.zh: 我不知道该说什么了 你们做的都太失败了

translation.en: Trinity, your levels, they were all over the place.
translation.zh: 崔尼蒂 你的水平真是起伏不定呀

translation.en: What was with that thing you did after the third count?
translation.zh: 第三拍以后 你那是什么动作？

translation.en: I thought I'd put a little extra stank on it.
translation.zh: 我是想增加一些噱头

translation.en: Oh… Well, if you could please refrain from stanking up the place,
translation.zh: 如果你能克制自己 不要再添乱了

translation.en: that would be lovely.
translation.zh: 那就最好了

translation.en: Well, I thought it looked dope.
translation.zh: 我觉得 刚才挺酷的

translation.en: Well, thankfully you're not the captain of this team.
translation.zh: 还好你不是雷鸟的队长

translation.en: Everyone, you can go. And practice, please.
translation.zh: 各位 你们可以走了 拜托好好练习吧

translation.en: Work on yourselves.
translation.zh: 自己加把劲

translation.en: Jas, stay.
translation.zh: 杰斯 你留下

translation.en: Thank you. I like 'em too.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我也很喜欢

translation.en: I took you back because you're good.
translation.zh: 我让你回来 是因为你很优秀

translation.en: But we do have corporate sponsorships to uphold.
translation.zh: 但我们只能穿赞助企业的品牌

translation.en: It's just a rehearsal.
translation.zh: 只是排练而已

translation.en: Well, birds of a feather flock together.
translation.zh: 物以类聚 人以群分

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: You can go.
translation.zh: 你可以走了

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: 谢谢 先生

translation.en: Okay, then. Seems like we have costumes figured out.
translation.zh: 好了 看来我们已经把服装解决了

translation.en: Now we just need to figure out this name thing.
translation.zh: 现在我们要给舞团起名字了

translation.en: -I kinda like TBDs. -Yeah, it's grown on me.
translation.zh: -我还挺喜欢待定的-我也越来越喜欢了

translation.en: What does it stand for again?
translation.zh: 到底是什么意思来着？

translation.en: To be determined...
translation.zh: “尚无定论”

translation.en: which I think really describes us.
translation.zh: 我觉得很符合我们

translation.en: -[Robby] You quit the Birds? -[Raven] Wait. So you're rejoining?
translation.zh: 你退出雷鸟了吗？ 等等 你要回归了吗？

translation.en: You think I was gonna let you guys win Work It without me? Yeah, I'm back.
translation.zh: 怎能让你们抛弃我自己去拿比赛冠军呢？ 是啊 我回来啦

translation.en: [all chanting] TBD! TBD!
translation.zh: 待定舞团！

translation.en: -TBD! -[Jas yells] You say what?
translation.zh: -待定舞团！-说什么？

translation.en: Beyoncé…
translation.zh: 碧昂丝…

translation.en: Queen Bey…
translation.zh: 碧昂丝女王…

translation.en: I pray that you make my feet swift tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我祈祷您明天能让我双脚如风

translation.en: May my flow be precise and may my moves have swagger.
translation.zh: 让我的舞步行云流水让我的动作昂首阔步

translation.en: In the name of the "Single Ladies" video,
translation.zh: 以“单身女士”音乐视频的名义

translation.en: the Lemonade short film, and the Netflix special Homecoming…
translation.zh: 以《柠檬水》短片的名义以Netflix特别返校节音乐会的名义

translation.en: I pray.
translation.zh: 我祈祷

translation.en: [Quinn] The next morning I could feel Queen Bey's light shining down on me.
translation.zh: 第二天早上 我能感觉到碧昂丝女王的光芒照在我身上

translation.en: I didn't know if I would completely humiliate myself onstage,
translation.zh: 我不知道我是否会在舞台上出糗

translation.en: but for the first time, I didn't care.
translation.zh: 但这一次 我并不在乎

translation.en: I felt ready.
translation.zh: 我觉得准备好了

translation.en: [repeating] No. No. We need to talk.
translation.zh: 不不 我们得谈谈

translation.en: I can't talk right now. I have to go to study group.
translation.zh: 来不及了 我得去学习小组了

translation.en: I found this.
translation.zh: 我发现这东西了

translation.en: -What's that? -Are you kidding me?
translation.zh: 那是什么？ 你在逗我吗？我还找到这个了

translation.en: I also found this.
translation.zh: 你在逗我吗？我还找到这个了

translation.en: Who is… "A-Dollar-Sign-A-P Rocky"?
translation.zh: “A美元符号AP 洛基”是谁呀？

translation.en: That's not how you say it--
translation.zh: 不是这样读的…

translation.en: I'll pronounce it how I wanna pronounce it, thank you.
translation.zh: 我想怎么读 就怎么读 谢谢

translation.en: What are you wearing?
translation.zh: 你穿的是什么？

translation.en: These are clothes. I'm going to st-- Library.
translation.zh: 衣服呀 我要去图书馆来着

translation.en: Oh, since when do you dress like Shakira when you go to the library?
translation.zh: 从什么时候开始去图书馆要打扮得跟夏奇拉一样？

translation.en: Am I an idiot to you? 'Cause I know you're dancing.
translation.zh: 你觉得我是傻子吗？ 因为我知道你在跳舞

translation.en: -I know you're doing it behind my back. -I understand you're mad.
translation.zh: 我也知道 你在背着我跳舞 你很生气 我能理解

translation.en: You have every right to be, but I have to be somewhere in 30 minutes,
translation.zh: 你有权生气但我要在30分钟内赶到那里

translation.en: -so if you could just-- -Mad?
translation.zh: -所以拜托…-生气？

translation.en: You know what? I am upset,
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我很气愤

translation.en: because we had a deal, and you're not going anywhere right now.
translation.zh: 因为我们说好的你现在哪里也不能去

translation.en: You are grounded.
translation.zh: 你被禁足了

translation.en: -♪ I'm gonna shove it ♪ -Where is she?
translation.zh: 她在哪呢？

translation.en: Quinn, you lied to me. You blew off your schoolwork.
translation.zh: 奎因 你骗我了 你的学业都毁了

translation.en: And I don't care what kind of personal breakthrough
translation.zh: 我不在乎你现在有什么个人突破

translation.en: you're having right now. You are not leaving this house.
translation.zh: 反正你不能离开这间屋子

translation.en: -Mom? -Yes?
translation.zh: -妈妈？-嗯？

translation.en: -I'm leaving this house. -No, you're not!
translation.zh: -我要离开了-不行

translation.en: Wh-- Quinn!
translation.zh: 什么 奎因！

translation.en: What the hell?
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: No! Whoa! What are you doing? You don't know how to drive a car.
translation.zh: 不行 你在做什么？你还不会开车呢

translation.en: I know. I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 我知道 对不起 我很抱歉

translation.en: I'm really happy, so I think this has to be a good thing, right?
translation.zh: 我很开心所以我觉得这样是对的 对吧？

translation.en: Wrong. Nuh-uh. Get out of the car.
translation.zh: 错了 快下车

translation.en: I can't. I have to go dance.
translation.zh: 不行 我得去跳舞了

translation.en: I am going to kill you.
translation.zh: 我要杀了你

translation.en: -Okay, great! Bye! -[engine revs]
translation.zh: 好的 太好了！拜拜！

translation.en: Get out of that car. You don't know how to drive. You're wrong!
translation.zh: 快下车 你不会开车 你错了！

translation.en: [mom] Quinn!
translation.zh: 奎因！

translation.en: It's a one-way street!
translation.zh: 那是单行路！

translation.en: You're going the wrong way!
translation.zh: 你走错路了！

translation.en: Oh, I gotta call an Uber.
translation.zh: 我得叫辆车了

translation.en: [male announcer] Okay, everybody,
translation.zh: 好了 各位

translation.en: please welcome three-time returning champions
translation.zh: 大家欢迎三连冠得主

translation.en: from Woodbright High, the Thunderbirds!
translation.zh: 亮木高中的雷鸟舞团！

translation.en: Holy shit!
translation.zh: 我的天啊！

translation.en: It's like the Rapture.
translation.zh: 真像是欢喜升天呀

translation.en: Quinn, where are you?
translation.zh: 奎因 你在哪呢？

translation.en: [Quinn] I'm coming, everybody!
translation.zh: 我来了 各位！

translation.en: Okay, I can't text and drive. I can barely drive.
translation.zh: 好吧 开车不能发短信 我还不太会开车呢

translation.en: Oh no! Oh my God!
translation.zh: 不要！我的天啊！

translation.en: Pyrotechnics.
translation.zh: 还有烟火啊

translation.en: Nice touch.
translation.zh: 很有手段啊

translation.en: [male announcer] Wow! What a performance from our returning champions.
translation.zh: 卫冕冠军的表演真是精彩呀

translation.en: And now for the judges' scores…
translation.zh: 现在请评委打分…

translation.en: 9.0! Putting the Thunderbirds in the lead!
translation.zh: 9.0！雷鸟舞团目前领先！

translation.en: Up next, our final team: TBD.
translation.zh: 下面是最后一支队伍 待定舞团

translation.en: Quinn's not here. What do we do?
translation.zh: 奎因没来 我们怎么办？

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: You ready?
translation.zh: 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: [all chanting repeatedly] TBD!
translation.zh: -我的天啊！-待定舞团！

translation.en: Are you Jasmine Hale?
translation.zh: 你是杰斯明哈勒吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I am.
translation.zh: 是啊 没错

translation.en: I'm with the New York Dance Academy.
translation.zh: 我是纽约舞蹈学院的

translation.en: I'd love to speak with you about joining our program in the fall.
translation.zh: 我想跟你聊聊 秋季来我校就读

translation.en: -I would love to speak with you. -Fantastic.
translation.zh: 我很愿意跟您聊聊 -太好了-我等这一天很久了

translation.en: I've been waiting my entire life. [laughs]
translation.zh: -太好了-我等这一天很久了

translation.en: -Quinn Ackerman. -Ms. Ramirez! You came.
translation.zh: 奎因艾克曼 拉米雷兹老师！你来啦

translation.en: Of course I came. You were so good.
translation.zh: 当然了 你表现太好了

translation.en: You… You illuminated the shit out of this place.
translation.zh: 你真是让舞台发光发亮了

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.zh: -非常感谢-你做到了

translation.en: -Yeah, you did. You did that, honey. -[Quinn] Thanks.
translation.zh: -非常感谢-你做到了 你做到了 我得告诉你我给你拿到纽约大学的名额了

translation.en: I gotta tell you, I just got a new position at NYU.
translation.zh: 你做到了 我得告诉你我给你拿到纽约大学的名额了

translation.en: Here's my card. I think you might like it there.
translation.zh: 这是我的名片 我觉得你可能会喜欢

translation.en: Call me.
translation.zh: 给我打电话

translation.en: [Ms. Ramirez] So good!
translation.zh: 太棒了！

translation.en: How does she keep getting jobs?
translation.zh: 她怎么总能找到工作呀？

translation.en: Are you Juilliard?
translation.zh: 你是茱莉亚吗？

translation.en: Juilliard? Uh… I don't know her.
translation.zh: 茱莉亚？我不认识她

translation.en: My name is Isaiah.
translation.zh: 我是以赛亚

translation.en: Robby, keep her safe.
translation.zh: 罗比 保护好奖杯

translation.en: Big Apple, baby.
translation.zh: 纽约 宝贝

translation.en: I knew you'd get in!
translation.zh: 我就知道你能被录取的！

translation.en: You did? Why didn't you tell me?
translation.zh: 是吗？为什么不告诉我？

translation.en: -[both laugh] -Looks like we'll be seeing a lot of each other next fall.
translation.zh: 看来明年秋天 我们能经常见面了

translation.en: [sarcastically] Yay.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Your performance today…
translation.zh: 你今天的表现…

translation.en: was actually not bad.
translation.zh: 其实还不赖

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢-谢谢

translation.en: I'm really happy for you guys.
translation.zh: 我很替你们开心

translation.en: I'm so bored of winning all the time, right?
translation.zh: 我已经厌倦自己独孤求败了 是吧？

translation.en: Anyway, I just thought I'd come over here and say congrats.
translation.zh: 好了 我就是觉得应该来恭喜你们

translation.en: I've changed.
translation.zh: 我已经变了

translation.en: Well…
translation.zh: 好吧…

translation.en: that was interesting.
translation.zh: 很有趣呢

translation.en: -Hm. -So whatcha up to now?
translation.zh: 你现在要做什么？

translation.en: Mm… Well, Mama's getting a new mattress today.
translation.zh: 老娘要去买新床垫了

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 是啊！

translation.en: -And it is extra spoon-worthy. -[Quinn giggles]
translation.zh: 席梦思床垫 酒杯永远不会洒哦

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: I'm pretty sure that we illegally won,
translation.zh: 我非常确定 我们的胜利违规了

translation.en: since rule 85 in the Work It code of conduct
translation.zh: 因为比赛规则第85条规定

translation.en: says you can't compete if you've already graduated.
translation.zh: 如果已经毕业 就不能参加比赛了

translation.en: Aw, look at that! Love is happening all around us, honey.
translation.zh: 你瞧瞧呀！ 爱情就在身边发生呢 亲爱的

translation.en: We just have to look for it.
translation.zh: 我们只需要追寻

translation.en: Play me something, boo.
translation.zh: 来点神情的曲子

translation.en: [Quinn] In the end, Einstein was right.
translation.zh: 到头来 爱因斯坦是对的

translation.en: Dancers are the athletes of God.
translation.zh: 舞者是上帝的运动员

translation.en: And, as it turns out, I'm one of them,
translation.zh: 事实证明 我是他们中的一员

translation.en: because it's actually not that hard to find a four-count
translation.zh: 因为找到音乐节拍

translation.en: or the beat of your own heart.
translation.zh: 或者自己的心跳 其实并不难

translation.en: All you have to do is listen to it.
translation.zh: 你只需要用心倾听

translation.en: That's all I've got figured out.
translation.zh: 这就是我的发现

translation.en: The rest is TBD.
translation.zh: 其余都是待定了
